On Wednesday the front desk ran our card twice, a mistake easily made.  Abdul, seated nearby overheard our concern and interceded immediately. With instant apologies and concern he stepped in. What happened next is still shocking to our little family celebrating my youngest's 5th birthday a week before kindergarten starts.  Abdul called me into his office, after a profound apology he immediately and convincingly explained how he would remedy the card and charges and that we would meet again before our day at Disney began.   I thanked Abdul and he took a
Manager Response: Hello divichke,  As the management of the Peacock Suites, I'd like to thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review about your stay with us! We are always pleased to hear when guests enjoy their stay with us. The Peacock Suites Family constantly strives to exceed our guests' expectations, and are so glad that we made your stay memorable.   Thank you again for your kind words and we do hope you visit us again in the near future!

Summary: We loved our stay!! Rooms were great, valet was terrific! All staff were lovely. Transport to Disneyland was handy & very reliable. We were lucky enough to have a terrific view of the Fireworks each night, which our 4 year old son loved! Microwave was handy after a long day... Would certainly stay again :)
Manager Response: Hello Shauna C,  What a great review and thank you so much for your kind words! I have shared all of your comments with the staff and we truly look forward to serving you and your family again in the future!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, not very good location for conference participants
Summary: Peacock suites is a nice hotel  with nice rooms and a nice sun deck. But if you don't have a car the location is not perfect. You can choose between seven eleven and a gas station for breakfast... After a while it sucks. Very friendly and helpful staff!
Manager Response: Thank you Jo1965,  As always, we truly appreciate when our guests take time out of their schedules to write comments about their stay. Your comments are no exception and we are glad to hear the positive comments regarding our staff.   Thank you again for your comments and we hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: It came as a surprise that there was no kitchen sink.  It was inconvenient and unappetizing to have to use the bathroom sink to wash dishes.  The fridge, microwave and coffee maker were useful.  The water pressure of the shower is poor.  We only had one housekeeping service which was not done when we asked.
Manager Response: Hello Karen534,   Thank you for your comments and for giving us an honest review. Feedback these days are priceless and without it we cannot continue to grow and get better at what we do. I wanted to apologize for not receiving the service you requested.  I hope you will consider staying with us again so we may show you the service in which we are known for.

Summary: We took a family vote and would give this a 2.5.  On the positives, it's right on the shuttle line to Disney, or you can walk, but it's a bit long for kids after a day at the park.  Also, the staff were very positive and helpful and there is valet parking if you have a vehicle (Samir was great with our car, very nice and fast).  On the cons, the pool area is essentially in a covered carport, with no sun and the sun deck is 4 stories higher.  We wanted to have a day at the hotel relaxing but my husband and son didn't leave the room because the sun deck was so hot, and the pool area looks so dark and unwelcoming.  Also the rooms are run down and only cleaned twice a week, although you can pay for extra.  There is no food at the hotel, although restaurants are in walking distance.
Manager Response: Hello LauraTedesco1968,  Thank you for taking time to leave us such a detailed review. Your concerns are certainly legitimate and have been addressed with our Management team.   We constantly strive to provide a 5-Star service and are sincerely concerned when we fall short of expectations.   We hope to have an opportunity to welcome you back again someday.

Summary Heading: The Peacock revealed its beautiful colors at Peacock Suites
Summary: My 3 day stay at Peacock Suites were terrific.  From check-in to valet parking to staff friendliness, everything was great.  Our room was clean, stocked and comfortable.  The only issue I had was I didn't particularly care for how the room was set up, with having to walk through the bed room to get to the kitchen and sitting area.  Also, although the valet parking staff was terrific, I didn't like paying for parking at $10 bucks a day.
Manager Response: Hello Van J,  Thank you for taking the time to express your thoughts about your stay at the Peacock Suites! Although we are disappointed to hear about the room set up and the parking fee, we appreciate your kind words about the staff.  For future reference, there are a few layouts that you can choose from if you have a preferred layout in mind. Please call us before your next vacation with us, and we will put forth all of our efforts into accommodating you.  Again, thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you again the next time you return to Anaheim!

Summary: We've been staying here for years. We visit Disney, knotsberry, and area beaches. Rooms are spacious, clean, and family friendly. Facilities are well kept by the maintenance department. Staff is great, especially the valet folks. If you're looking for a SoCal vacation, this establishment is a value for what you get.
Manager Response: Hello JFigstah,  Thank you for continuing to come back to the Peacock Suites! We are so glad that you keep returning to stay with us and that your experience has been so pleasant!   Thank you again for this review and we look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: Quiet location and close to Disney
Summary: Sorry for the delay in this review.  My wife and I stayed here the first week of May and loved it.  It is a very quiet location but it is within walking distance to some great restaurants and even Disneyland.  The best part is you can take public transportation for $5 a day per person roundtrip to the Disney parks and save on parking and very convenient.  The hotel is very clean and the staff were all cheerful and responsive.  The ladies at the concierge desk were very informative and recommended some great packages.  Definitely a great place to stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Dorothy and Jayden were wonderful at check-in. They made the check-in process extremely easy and enjoyable! The facility is very clean and in a location that is convenient to Disneyland. There is a parking fee for each night you are there, but it is no more than what you would expect at a California hotel.
Manager Response: Hello disneyfan442016,   Thank you for taking the time to let us and other guests know about your recent experience at the Peacock Suites!  Dorothy and Jayde will be so excited to hear about this review!   Your comments are truly appreciated, and we hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: Great hotel.  Staff is beyond friendly - saying hi and asking how the little one's trip is going so far.  The bed/pillows are amazing - seriously the most comfortable bed we have ever slept in (including our own).... would love to be able to purchase one of them. Pool is on the smaller side but very relaxed atmosphere, splashing and jumping in is welcomed. Valet service is quick and friendly. Everywhere we wanted to go was easy to get to and the front desk was very helpful with directions.  Our room had a microwave, mini fridge, toaster, sink, standard coffee pot, and a full set of dishes for 6 including a can opener! On site bbq's were great to have available.  Used them 3 times and each time they were immaculately clean and ready to go.
Manager Response: Hello djrobinson06,  We are so glad you enjoyed your stay at the Peacock Suites! Thank you for the kind words about the staff; everyone at the Peacock Suites is always thrilled to hear when a guest appreciates their hard work and effort.   Thank you again and we look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: The first day the sewage came up through the bathroom sink drains. They are having problems with their plumbing. The service was great but the problem with their sewage needs to be taken care of. I will not be staying at this resort again.
Manager Response: Hello georgehN2448MQ,  Thank you for taking the time to share your review. Your concerns are certainly legitimate and have been addressed with our team. We constantly strive to provide 5-star service and are sincerely concerned when we fall short of expectations. We appreciate your candid feedback that assists us in focusing our energies and continuing to improve product and services.

Summary: We stayed at the Peacock Suites and had a very pleasant stay. Came in for a graduation and needed a home base hotel. It is located only a short  walk away toany restaurants, shopping.  The staff was more than helpful for all our needs. Want to mention some standouts. Special thanks to Jayden, Jackson & Moira who worked the checkin area & Samir, who tending to our car in valet.  My only disappointment would be the pool area. It was very small & under an overhang. The plus side, if you wanted to catch some rays, there was a very cozy rooftop sun deck. Overall, the Peacock Suites, was a pleasant vacation experience.
Manager Response: Hello Dianne D,  Thank you so much for sharing this feedback! We are so glad that you found the staff to be 'more than helpful'; that is certainly our goal!  Thank you again for taking the time to write your review and we look forward to seeing you again when your travels bring you back to Anaheim!

Summary: We were having a transportation issue with one of the tour companies and Katelynn at the front desk was a great help. She called the company, explained our situation and continued to work with us until the situation was resolved. Thanks Katelynn for going the extra mile for us. We have stayed at this hotel many times and have always been satisfied with our stay.
Manager Response: Hello imateacher14,  We were delighted to read your review! The Guest Service team is always excited to be a memorable part of a guest's experience, so we thank you for recognizing our efforts and we will definitely share this review with Katelyn.   Your continued patronage is sincerely appreciated, and we look forward to hosting you again!

Summary: My wife and I took the kids for a weekend visit to Disneyland. It has been a couple of years since our last stay and the property looks beautiful. New exterior paint and totally refurbished rooms were stunning. The property has a medium sized covered play pool and spa which we enjoyed. The staff is always friendly and the hotel is a stop for the area bus to Disneyland. We had a great stay!
Manager Response: Hello jusserchn,   We are so glad to know that you enjoyed your stay with us during your Disneyland trip! Thank you so much for your kind words about the property itself and the staff! We hope to you welcome you again when you return for your next Disneyland adventure!

Summary Heading: Spacious 2 Bed Suite, Good Accommodations, Friendly People, Relaxing Stay
Summary: We are Shell Vacation Club owners and anytime in town, we pick here to stay. They have recently refreshed the rooms and the hotel and it shows that Wyndham is really trying to make improvements in all they offer. They have removed their breakfast room, which is okay, because with a kitchenette, it's just as easy to go to the local market and pick up snacks/food to eat. The outside has been recently repainted and the colors are more current and modern. We upgraded to a 2-bedroom suite and they also upgraded us to free valet based on our tenure with Shell Vacation Club/Wyndham. People complain about having to pay parking and valet, but with such tight quarters, I wouldn't want anyone else parking around me than experienced, efficient valet operators. Even when it is crowded with
Manager Response: Hello jamaicabitty,  Thank you for taking the time to express your thoughts about your stay at Peacock Suites! We are so glad you were able to relax during your stay overall; however, we are concerned about the housekeeping situation you experienced. We want to thank you for informing us about your experience and will continue to improve our product so you can have a more memorable experience the next time you return to Peacock Suites.  Thank you again for taking the time to write your review and we hope we see you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: More than a hotel, close to Disney and ART transportation
Summary: Location, location, location.  If you want to do Anaheim, this is a great place to be.  The concierge has plenty of suggestions for your time,  The ART, which is the Anaheim Resort area bus is right outside the hotel.  This may allow you to leave the car at home, and avoid a rental and those valet charges.    The ART pass is available by the day or by multiple days, and is very economical.    The places I wanted to go were not within easy walking distance, but with ART I got to Knotts Berry Farm, some great restaurants in downtown Anaheim, as well as Disney, where all busses go.  So Peacock is a great base if you are doing the tourist thing.   Peacock is more than a hotel, but less than a resort property.  As a time share owner, I am used to a full kitchen, usually a dishwasher
Manager Response: Greetings VTyankee,   Thank you so much for taking time to leave us such a detailed review! We're so pleased to read that Peacock Suites has great service which is our biggest focus along with guest satisfaction. We realize you have many options when it comes to lodging and we appreciate you choosing the Peacock Suites!  Again, thank you for taking the time to write your review and we look forward to your next visit when you return to the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Really nice property - no major concerns here
Summary: We have been to this hotel many times - and it keeps getting better!  The only negative is that they no longer offer a complimentary breakfast and their fitness room could use some repairs.  TIPS:   PRICE: Affordable LOCATION: Approx 12 min walk to Disney.  5  min drive to Target./McDonalds.  20 min drive to great beaches. 5 min drive to Outlet Malls.  15 min drive from John Wayne Airport. POOL/DECK - Deck is on the rooftop & is awesome!  Lots of seating and has very nice music.  It is also non-smoking which is perfect.  Pool is on the main floor (separate from deck) and seems decent but is very small and is mostly in shade. EMPLOYEES;  Their housekeeping & building maintenance staff are so good!  They are always cleaning, painting or doing repairs.   PARKING:  Valet parking
Manager Response: Hello Pianos001,  Thank you so much for this detailed review. We do appreciate you highlighting the features of our resort. Also, thank you for your kind words about the housekeeping and maintenance staff; we will ensure they are recognized for their hard work and efforts.   Again, thank you for your review and we hope to see you again when you do return to the Anaheim area.

Summary: From the minute we arrived, we were warmly greeted and welcomed and this continued throughout the entire week.  The staff was exceptional.  Katelyn, Violet, Nayelie, Debbie, Zoe and Jose Vazyuez are just a few of the people we remember.  They were very attentive to our needs and responded quickly and efficiently to our requests.  The 3 bedroom was ok, but the 2 bedroom was awesome.  Spacious and had a great floor plan.  Most everything we needed was within walking distance.  We did buy a 5 day pass to use the ART and that was one of the best things we bought.   The pool area was great.  When they had to install lighting and a sound system in the pool area they did let us know that it would be noisy.  They were very polite and friendly.  We will only stay at the Peacock when we
Manager Response: Hello Jane,  First and foremost, thank you so much for this great comment! I will be sure to share this with the team. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here at Peacock Suites, and we look forward to you visiting us again when you do come back to Anaheim.   Thank you again and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: The resort was close to Disneyland. We walked there each time. It has a small pool with 2 jacuzzi. The room decoration was amazingly good. Our room have 1 bedroom with 2 queen beds. It was separate from the living room so it's great. The kids can sleep earlier n we can watch TV. It has a table tennis n soccer game table. Each day there were free coffee n hot chocolate by the reception. All the receptionist were accommodating. Even when my husband was not totally happy about something, they went a long way to fix it and made up for it. Location is great. All the shops are close by.
Manager Response: Hello nana250275,  Thank you so much for your feedback and for recognizing the staff's efforts to making your stay as pleasant as possible. We are so glad this location was convenient for your Disneyland trip.   Thank you again! We hope you choose to stay with us again on your next Disney trip!

Summary: What all the chat boards said about the front desk being top notch is true.  Skeptical at first but we did experience one of the highest level of service here based on all our stays at Wyndham locations to date.  We checked in close to midnight and Jayde at the front desk found out that the unit we were assigned had a maintenance issue.  Through no fault of hers, she had to spend time to check numerous other options to get us something to our satisfaction which took close to an hour.  Unfortunately she was at the brunt of our crankiness at midnight having traveled east to west coast and it being past 3am east coast time.  We were tired and were unhappy at that point.  Never frazzled she maintained her professionalism and even brought extra water, goodies ...etc after we got to
Manager Response: Hello Chris K,   Truly, thank you so much for sharing this feedback! We have recognized both Jonathan and Jayde for their efforts. We are so pleased that despite the mishap that occurred on your first night with us, you still were able to enjoy the rest of your stay. Also, please congratulate your daughter on our behalf on running that Tinker Bell Race! That must have been very exciting!  Again, thank you for your comments, and we hope to see you the next time your travels bring you back into Anaheim!

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights in May.  Staff was friendly and welcoming.  The rooms were clean.  It was nice having a microwave and fridge available to use.  A sink in the kitchenette would have been helpful, instead of using the bathroom sink.  The pool is quite small.  Walls are VERY thin in the hotel, and the reason for 3 instead of 4 stars.  We could hear full conversations from our neighbors (and I am sure they heard us).  No one was speaking loudly, the walls were just that thin between the closed connecting doors.  The plumbing was crazy loud...when neighbors showered or used the toiled, we thought a freight train was coming through.  The ART bus stop is right out front which was very convenient.  ART buses come about every 20 minutes.
Manager Response: Hello TravlnTwins,  Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We appreciate both negative and positive reviews. Thank you for recognizing the staff's dedication to customer service.   Thank you again and we hope to have an opportunity to welcome you back again someday!

Summary: Loved this hotel. Close to Disneyland. The 2 bedroom suite was enough room for 2 families. Only complaints was that it didn't have a full kitchen and the water was so hard it left all of our skins super dry for weeks! Overall I would stay there again!
Manager Response: Hello Travelingwithkids661,  Thank you for including the Peacock Suites on your family vacation to Disneyland. It sounds as though the layout of our suites was a great fit for your getaway. We look forward to your next vacation with us!

Summary: We stayed at Peacock Suites for a week and it was only about 20min walk to Disneyland and 15min to small shopping centre with several food places including pizza, Chinese and Subway. Even less to walk to 7-Eleven at the end of the block. There is a bus stop just outside for the Disney area shuttles and not far to 2 regular bus stops. On the ground floor near reception is the heated pool with spas and a large open area with bbq, table tennis, arcade games and tables & chairs. Staff were great no matter who or where they were - always friendly, happy and eager to be of any help.  We had a one bedroom unit on the 3rd floor - there are 2 lifts of reasonable size. We walked in to a spacious vanity area with a door on the right leading into the bathroom - annoying that the door would
Manager Response: Hello jbgh1995,  We were delighted to read your observations! We appreciate your detailing the features of our suites and amenities. We are glad to hear that you will stay with us again. Your continued patronage is sincerely appreciated and look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: A 20 min walk to Disneyland or a quick shuttle.    Rooms very nicely renovated.  Too bad they can't renovate for sound proofing.  Only complaint I had was that you could hear everything from above and beside.  Request a top floor room.  The staff are great!!  Very clean place.  Pool is smaller but really since we were there for Disneyland it was a great place for the grandkids to burn off steam before returning to the park.
Manager Response: Hello JuliaandRocky,  Thank you for your review! We are pleased that you found our location convenient to Disneyland and thank you for your kind words about the staff, as well. We constantly strive to exceed our guests' expectations.  Again, thank you for your feedback as we do look to reviews to guide us on, not only what we are doing well, but what we can do to continue to improve our services and amenities.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again someday!

Summary Heading: Facilities are a mere 2, but guest services earn a 5
Summary: These are among the most compact suites, good for 2 but a little busy when converting the living room to a sleeping room to accommodate 3 or 4. Yet if you come for the surrounding attractions (Disneyland,  Knott's Berry Farm, etc.) and spend little time in the room, it's fine.  Plus,  my high rating is due to the wonderful staff. They even surprised my son with balloons on his birthday, and were amazing and accommodating in every respect. They fully catered to our needs. This is how an average facility rises above the rest.  We look forward to our next visit!
Manager Response: Hello corozalwien,  We appreciate you taking the time to write this review. The entire staff is always excited to be a memorable part of a guest's experience, so we thank you for recognizing our efforts.   Thank you again for your feedback! We look forward to seeing you and your family when your travels bring you back to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Very Nice Stay at Peacock Suites
Summary: We stayed at Peacock Suites for seven days.   We were in Anaheim area for both a conference at the convention center and also of course to enjoy Disneyland and California Adventure.  We liked our cozy room.  The sleeping area is divided from the family room area.  We found the beds very comfortable and slept well each night we were there,  The family area was great for organizing for the conference and for our outings.  We made breakfast in the morning in the microwave area - coffee area in the morning  There is a nice table to sit at.   We had a small couch.  There were two televisions.  On the first floor of the resort is the family play areas.  One section has pool and game tables, barbecues, places to sit.  There is the swimming and hot tub area in another section.  There is
Manager Response: Hello Mini,  Thank you so much for this wonderful review and for your kind words about the staff! I will make sure to share your comments with the entire team. I am so glad you found the hotel comfortable and convenient for your trip to Disneyland.   Thank you again and we do hope we get the opportunity to host you and your family again when you return to the Anaheim area.

Summary: After a long travel day and wanting to check in early we were offered a complimentary room upgrade! The sweetest girl named Katelyn was amazing! She was so helpful and friendly! Also Angel was awesome and got us discounted coupons! Valet is well worth it they have gone out of their way to help with luggage and other bags.. We travel a lot and this has been one of the best overall stays! All the Staff have been so helpful and always offer help and are very friendly.. We switched from another hotel to  Peacock and I am so glad we did! BEST DECISION!  And the little cake was adorable! It's the staff here that makes it more superior then other places we will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Greetings Christina,  Wow! Thank you so much for this great review! We are pleased to hear when guests enjoy themselves and will share this feedback with the entire team.  We hope that you will choose to stay with us again the next time you make a trip to Anaheim. Thank you again for your comments!

Summary: We stayed here for 11 nights as a family of five (2a/3 kids under 9).  Pros- reasonably priced, good distance to Disney. ART bus runs right near front door. Staff extremely friendly. Great service at front reception.  Cons- very noisy- walls are very thin and you can hear everything from the next room and hall. Housekeeping weren't great- had to ask to get things restocked and room wasn't really cleaned while we were there. Overall, an ok place to stay for the price and proximity to Disney
Manager Response: Hello Zaroca,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a detailed review. The Guest Service team is always excited to be a memorable part of a guest's experience, so we thank you for recognizing our efforts.  Though we are pleased you found our location convenient for your trip to Disneyland, we are concerned about your feedback about the noise level and housekeeping. Our Housekeeping Manager, as well as myself, is addressing the issues promptly as it is of vital importance. We appreciate your feedback that assists us in focusing our energies and continuing to improve product and services.   We hope to welcome you back again someday!

Summary Heading: A really comfortable place to stay
Summary: I stayed here for a week of Disney stuff with my kids.  The hotel was clean and the staff always pleasant.  Our checkin was quick and thorough.  The rooms were clean and lots of room.  It was a really nice place to stay that is walking distance to Disney and many nice restaurants.  Ahhh Cheesecake Factory.  We would love to stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Grant!  We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your visit to the Peacock Suites! I have shared all of your comments with the staff and we truly look forward to serving you and your family again in the future!

Summary: The staff is the most helpful staff we've ever encountered! The rooms and property are immaculate.  There is only valet parking, but the valets are attentive and quick. There was no cook top or oven in the room and the kitchen sink hadn't been installed.  Otherwise, I would've given five stars.
Manager Response: Hello Cadillacandchevy,  Thank you for your kind words about our staff! We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay overall, and appreciate your feedback where it is needed as we look to these to move forward.   We look forward to seeing you again when you return to Anaheim!

Summary: We haven't stayed here YET (we arrive next Tuesday) but I had to write a review for the great customer service that I received from Katelyn @ The Peacock Suites.    This past Wednesday Katelyn called me to confirm our reservations for next week and in doing so we found there was an error.  And at the time she called me I was literally in the exam room and my doctor was about to come in and I told her I'd call her back.  But before we hung up she did inform me that  because I had booked the room back in January of this year and with spring break she informed me that the hotel was booked up. I was freaking out since we were taking our grandson with us as well.  Since I am an Elite Shell Vacations owner  Katelyn wasn't quite sure how we could easily make the change but she was
Manager Response: Hello Dani D,  Wow, that is absolutely amazing. Thank you so much for this review; I will make sure we share this with the team!  I hope you are recovering well and that your stay is as expected.  Thank you again for your time and feedback.

Summary: I stayed in Peacock suites for 2 nights with my partner. Pretty happy with the service and environment. The room is well-designed and we received a welcome gift when we arrived. Walkable distance to Disney (approx 20 mins) or you can choose to take the shuttle which is just outside the hotel ($5 per day).   Only one downside was there is no kettle in the room so we can only use microwave if you need some hot water, which is not too convenience.
Manager Response: Greetings Olivia!  Thank you for your review! We're happy that you found our location from Disneyland convenient during your recent vacation. We also appreciate the kind words about the service and have shared your comments with the team.   Thank you again for choosing us for your trip to Disneyland, and we look forward to hosting you again!

Summary Heading: Best Hotel you will ever stay at
Summary: This is the only place I will stay in Anaheim. The value for the price is amazing. The beds are the most comfortable beds I have ever slept on and the rooms are great for a group or friends or a family. This is a little far from disneyland but they have a shuttle that picks up right in front.
Manager Response: Hello Containsnofruitjuice,  Thank you so much for taking the time to express your thoughts about your stay at the Peacock Suites! We are always thankful to our guests who react positively to their stay and want others to know about it!  Thank you again for the time you took to write your review! We look forward to your return in the future!

Summary: We stayed at the Peacock Suites for 4 Nights.  I thought it was a good value for the area and much less than the LA area hotels.  Valet parking was acceptable since we knew what we were getting into before we booked it.  We never waited for valet more than 5 mins. The staff was very professional and accommodating.  I gave a firm but kind no to the timeshare people and they didn't bother me again.  My only comment is regarding the noise in the hallways.  The walls were quite thin and 7-9 each morning was a constant parade.  Garden Walk was close by and restaurants were no more than 3-5 miles away.
Manager Response: Hello Arrounddeworld,  Thank you so much for your comments and for giving an honest review. We appreciate hearing both the negative and positive aspects of your stay and look to these to help us move forward.  Thank you again and we look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: First, let me start with the positive. We had a 1-bedroom suite which was nicely appointed. There were 2 queens in the bedroom, and a fold-out couch in the living room. The decor was modern and appealing. Weird layout though, you enter your door into the bedroom, bath on right, then go through sliding doors to living area. Just thought it backward, puts you sleeping next to a frequently noisy hallway. The view out the window was a nasty littered parking lot. But overall, the room was comfortable and nice. Now for the negatives. First, they have a mandatory valet service, but their valet staff is rude and pushy. We had to firmly insist on parking in one of the very open spots near the elevator to unpack the car, before turning the keys over. Then, the inconvenience factor is
Manager Response: Hello Karen,   Thank you for taking time to leave us such a detailed review. Your concerns are certainly legitimate and have been addressed with our staff. We constantly strive to provide 5-star service and are sincerely concerned when we fall short of expectations. We hope to have an opportunity to welcome you back again someday!

Summary: We booked the room through RCI and this is probably the oldest place we've stayed at. The rooms are clean and accommodations are alright... Except there is no self parking, you have to deal with valet every time you come and go. Parking is over 10 a day plus tips to valet. If you're in your room on your housekeeping day and you don't want it... Absolutely hang your sign as they just walked into my room before 9am... Not happy. Also, the time share people were blowing up my room phone before 8am for a tour... That I wasn't booked for. Good location for attractions but I won't be back
Manager Response: Hello Stephanie,  Though we are pleased you found our location and guestrooms comfortable and convenient, we are concerned about your feedback regarding housekeeping and the phone calls for the tour. Our Guest Services Manager is addressing the issues promptly as it is of vital importance.   We appreciate your candid feedback that assists us in focusing our energies and continuing to improve product and services.   We do hope you will consider visiting again!

Summary Heading: Great option for a trip to Disneyland
Summary: I recently took my two daughters, 13 & 17 to Disneyland.  We stayed here for two nights. We arrived late around 8pm and the staff was great.  Jackson checked us in and was super helpful and very friendly.  We received a check in gift with snacks and drinks for the kids. We were tired and wanted to eat in so Jackson gave me several take out menus and suggested we check out the dvd collection that is available for loan in the lobby. Valet parking is required at $10.50 per night, this was very convenient and I knew my car would be safe during our stay. We stayed in a Queen suite that came with two queen beds and a sofa bed.  The room was very clean and felt modern.  There is a dining table with chairs. The kitchen was equipped with a refrigerator, microwave, and coffee maker as
Manager Response: We were delighted to read your observations! We appreciate your detailing the features of our suites and resort amenities; in particular, our staff's customer-service philosophy.   We have passed along all of your wonderful comments to each department head so that they can let their staff members know that all of their hard work is being appreciated, especially Jackson!   Thank you for the time you took to write your review! We look forward to having you return to the Peacock Suites in the future!

Summary: Great location easy access to Disney world all within walking distance,all amenities from pool to gym on site.Anaheim has a lot to offer loads of restaurants and bars all nearby.would highly recommend this place if visiting Los Angeles.
Manager Response: Hello Claire F,  We are so thrilled to hear that you really enjoyed your stay at the Peacock Suites earlier this month! Thank you so much for taking the time to put your comments in writing and we look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: We had one bedroom place for two nights. The lounge area was spacious enough with good furniture and well equipped kitchenette on one side. Bedroom arrangement was good for me, my wife and two children.  Front staff was courteous enough, valets were ok.   However, tour lady pestered us about attending the seminar on investing in property being developed by hotel owners.
Manager Response: Hello Kiwiluck,  Thank you so much for your review! Without feedback, we cannot continue to grow and help us to create a truly memorable vacation for all of our guests!   Thank you again for your thoughts and we look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: We stayed here for two nights and it was great. It is close to the Disney Parks if you like a walk, however the shuttle bus leaves from the front of the hotel. The room was comfortable and there is coffee available for free in the foyer, and if you are quick in the morning there are also donuts. There is a 7 eleven around the corner. I believe this is a time share group of hotels as the concierge was very keen to sign me up for a talk and viewing of the hotel, with Disney money as the incentive. She didn't seem to want to take no for an answer. This is my only problem, I would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Jordelli,  First and foremost, I wanted to thank you for your feedback and recommendation! While we understand your concern about the concierge desk, we do hope that their knowledge about the area and helpfulness enhanced your overall visit.   Thank you again for your time! We look forward to your return in the future!

Summary Heading: This is a good location for access to Disneyland which is a 10-12 minute walk. Rooms are very nice and consistent.
Summary: We have been to this location probably 20 times. We revisit for a number of reasons; competitively priced, no surprises, no problems, comfortable rooms, kitchenette etc. The only down side is waiting for ART to get a ride where you want to go, driving or walking... Accessibility to family based services is not an easy walk which makes it difficult if you have young ones along. Play area is limited to a couple of pinball games and a snack machine. The pool area is not suitable for young children unless you have flotation devices or want to hold them. Staff are helpful and want to please the guests. Since our primary objective is to get to Disneyland I am willing to sacrifice the child related deficiencies. There is no restaurant at the facility. Take what you need.
Manager Response: Hello Mike!   Thank you for choosing the Peacock Suites for your trip to Disneyland! We are glad you found our property convenient and our staff helpful. A small insight into your experience is invaluable and we appreciate you sharing this not only with management here at the property but also our potential future guests and owners.   Thank you again for your time and we look forward to your future visit!

Summary: Nice room, like two queen size beds! Half kichen with microwave, no stove! Walking distance to Disneyland or take shuttle to Disneyland right in front of condo! Buy shuttle tickets right on premises! Employees very friendly and helpful! Two elevators; one goes to the 3rd floor ( First one), second one goes to the 4 Th floor!) There is a Valet parking fee!  You can't  park your own car! The attendant will bring the car to you and park for you also!
Manager Response: Hello Ineke!   Thank you so much for taking the time to express your thoughts about your stay at the Peacock Suites! We have passed your comments onto our staff to read so that they know they are appreciated in their contributions to make your stay as nice as it was!  Thank you again and we look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: If it wasn't the movement of guests in the room above (at times we thought they must have been doing a Haka above us), or the noisiest plumbing ever, it was the traffic noise from the street and close proximity of the highway. We had minimal sleep while staying here. Linen was thin, pillows high and hard. Room was small. Facilities were in need of a revamp. Location was good for Disneyland, we walked most days. Ate at a local restaurant which was within walking distance a few times, Fire and Ice.........all you can eat barbecued food.  Staff were excellent.  Would I stay here again....no!
Manager Response: Hello Eden,   Thank you so much for your comments and for giving an honest review. I want to apologize for the noise you experienced during your stay as it is always our goal to create a relaxing yet exciting environment for our guests. I hope you will reconsider staying with us in the future so we may give you the experience that you deserve; we can always try to accommodate you based on your specific needs as well!

Summary: Just returned from a three night stay. We had two adjoining rooms, each with two beds and a sofa-bed. The rooms were wonderful! Fully equipped with everything you will need: Fridge, microwave, dishes, utensils, coffee, popcorn, two tv's toiletries, an iron, hair dryer and a lighted make up mirror!. The beds were VERY comfortable, and there were extra linens in the room. There is plenty of drawer and closet space for you to store all your "stuff". The property itself is amazingly clean and well maintained. I didn't see anything that I thought was dirty, and I am pretty picky about that. Plants are beautiful and well taken care of. There are plenty of trash receptacles as well as recycling bins. The rooftop is very relaxing with lounge chairs, sofas and music. We watched the
Manager Response: Hello Kathy,  As always, we truly appreciate when our guests take time out of their schedules to write comments about their stay here at the Peacock Suites! Thank you for your comments about the property and especially about our staff! We are always thrilled to hear good things about all our staff members and they do get passed on so that everyone knows they have been recognized! Thank you again for your time and we look forward to your return in the future!

Summary: I swapped my timeshare in Australia for 2 weeks here. Only 5 mins by shuttle to Disneyland. The shuttle stops at the resort 20 past the hour. It costs $2 for adults. The staff were welcoming  However, they offer a free breakfast and money to sit through a timeshare blurb..I found this annoying as it always happens in the US.  There is a laundry, pool and exercise room.  The rooms are cleaned midweek. A small kitchen is in each unit. I would recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Good Afternoon Liz,  Thank you so much for your comments; we appreciate your recommendation and kind words about the staff!  We appreciate both the negative and positive aspects of your stay and look to these to continue to grow.  Thank you again for taking the time to write your review! We look forward to your return in the future!

Summary: The room was OK. Pillows were not comfortable. Decent kitchenette - appreciated a full size coffee maker. However the fridge was pretty small.  Did not like having to pay $10 a day for parking plus having to pay $5 per person) each day to take a shuttle to Disneyland.  May stay there again, we'll see
Manager Response: Good Afternoon Dawn,  I wanted to thank you for taking the time to write about your experience at the Peacock Suites. While we are disappointed to hear that you felt your stay was only mediocre, we appreciate your comments.  Although I know you mentioned having some second thoughts in choosing to stay with us again, I want to reassure you that guest satisfaction is our highest priority. We hope to see you again soon and thank you again for your feedback.

Summary: I had read previous reviews & so was concerned about kitchen.  We must have been in a newly renovated room because everything was great. Sink in kitchen area, soap & dishtowels to wash dishes (service for 4) in between housekeeping. Decent sized fridge. We made breakfast & light suppers there with no trouble. Wonderful shower in separate bathroom with toilet. Large countertop with Sink, toiletries, hairdryer, lighted makeup mirror when walked in door. Pullout sofa, coffee table, dresser with tv atop, table & 4 chairs in living room.  Sliding French door to bedroom with 2 comfortable queen beds with table between, dresser with tv on top, armoire, easy chair. Best lighting I have ever had in a hotel room:  overhead, floor, & tabletop (which had plugs to easily charge cell phone).
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to make a comment about your recent stay; we are happy to hear it was enjoyable. Your comments mean a lot to us and we pride ourselves on listening to our guests and continuing to strive to provide the best experience possible. I hope we are able to accommodate you during your future visits into Anaheim!

Summary Heading: THIS PLACE IS TRULY A HOME AWAY FROM HOME
Summary: Recently my wife, three children and I had the extreme pleasure of visiting the Peacock Suites in Anaheim Ca. I say visit because we truly felt like we were visiting family. The staff was very courteous, the rooms were very modern, well kept, and the proximity to Disneyland was very convenient. Due to my line of work as a Personal Health Coach, I travel a lot so I consider it a hobby rating and keeping track of the good places to stay. Without a doubt I would rate this establishment 10 stars, unfortunately this site only allows for five, but if an exemption were ever made for more stars, it should definitely be made for this place. I will surely be back for many years to come. I recommend you do not pass this place up, it's a ,"keeper". Tell a friend.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for the high marks. Every guest who comes to the property is an opportunity for us to leave a lasting impression. We truly appreciate all you had to say and are so glad to hear that you would return to see us again on your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Nightmare at the Peacock place in Anaheim...
Summary: OMG...this is my worst nightmare vacation so far.... 1- 1st room & veiw  unreal...broken a/c units- debris- nasty garage- cement landing to somewhere, simply not a pretty site. 2- room is actually a hotel room, crowded with all that can fit in or a small studio. NOT a 1 bedroom as advertised! 3- Adjoining room, wall repair going on...smell of paint & turpentine filling our room...feeling sick to stomach....maintenance taped both doors / sealed off so the smell would not enter our room...OMG...took an hour or so , we went out for dinner to get out...no smell when we returned. 4-NO HEAT....nice maintenance man reset stat, blower took awhile but got up to 68...ok went to bed. 5- Awoke at 56 degrees in the room...OMG...a few hours later it was determined the blower motor was dead &
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at the Peacock Suites. While we are disappointed to hear that you felt your stay fell below your expectations, we appreciate your comments. We would like for you to know that we have taken your comments to heart and I want to reassure you that guest satisfaction is our highest priority.  We hope to see you again soon and thank you again for your feedback.

Summary: This is a nice hotel/timeshare in a good location close to Disneyland , if that is your trip destination. The insulation is great as we never heard anyone slamming doors or being loud in the hallways. The bed was super comfortable. The decor was very nice. The staff is very helpful and friendly.  The rooms are suites so you have a bedroom & the living area has a nice sleeper sofa that has a great mattress on it, that made you feel like you were in  real bed. I was surprised at how small the room was, but hubby told me it was "big" for the city. The gift shop is great & you will save big money buying disney stuff there instead of the park. That's the good...   Here's the not so good. Although I was told upon reservation this was a timeshare resort, I was also under the impression
Manager Response: Thank you for this comprehensive review! Feedback these days is priceless and without it we cannot continue to grow and get better at what we do. I hope you will reconsider staying with us in the future so we may show you the service in which we are known for.

Summary: Got our accommodation through timeshare and we definitely enjoyed our stay! Friendly staff, clean room and you can see the nightly fireworks from Disneyland on the rooftop! Nearby walking distance amenities such 7/11, The Cheesecake Factory, etc. Shuttle bus stops right at the front every 20 mins for a 5 min bus ride to Disneyland. Also check out the gift shop on Level 3 for souvenirs, more affordable than the shops at Disneyland :)
Manager Response: On behalf of the Peacock Suites, we would like to thank you for taking the time to provide this review! We're glad you found the location convenient and thank you for your kind words about our staff.  We look forward to your return in the future!

Summary Heading: Base level timeshare resort with a great location
Summary: This is a pretty basic timeshare resort property with moderate room layouts and a solid level of customer service.  Friendly desk staff.  Prompt and friendly (required) valet.  Well appointed rooms with basic amenities.  But a GREAT location, close to Anaheim Garden Walk and Disney.  Plenty of restaurants and the like nearby.  Easy walk to Disney (or you can pay for the shuttle).
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review. We appreciate your kind words about the staff and have been shared with our team here at the Peacock Suites.  We're also glad that you found our location convenient to local attractions.   We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: I have a previous review of this location but I wanted to add some more details from our most recent  visit.   We requested a murphy bed 1 bedwoom which gave us 4 beds in our unit. So none of the kids had to share. Also, we made use if the social area in the 1st floor. They have 2 grills, pink ppng, a pool table and some vending machines. It made our stay that much more comfortable. Thanks Peacock!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing this feedback! It sounds as though the layout of our spacious murphy suite was a great fit for your vacation. The Peacock Suites constantly strives to exceed our guests' expectations and accommodate any requests, if available. We are also glad you were able to enjoy our recreational area.   We look forward to hosting you again!

Summary: I have stayed here multiple times when visiting Anaheim for both business and family vacations.  The rooms are nicely appointed with a separate sitting room that can be closed off as a second sleeping area.  A shuttle bus stop is immediately in front of the hotel with reasonable fees to take you to Disneyland.  The advantage of the shuttle is that you can ride as often as you like, making it easy to take a  midday break and return to the parks for evening parades, fireworks, etc.  The pool is small, but still OK for the kids to unwind.  The hotel is also within walking distance of several restaurants.  Perfect for families.
Manager Response: Thank you for this comprehensive review!  We are honored that you choose to stay with us when traveling on business or on family vacations. We know that you have a choice when visiting Anaheim and do appreciate that you choose the Peacock Suites on multiple occassions.   Thank you again for your time and we hope that you will choose to stay with us again on your next trip into Anaheim!

Summary: Hi me and my wife spent our honeymoon at the peacock suites and was greatly looked after with every issue we had weather it was getting to place or just general quires Dorothy was a great help at checkin i can not fault this place at all and would defiantly stay again I would also like to thank the staff for all there help   Thanks   Paul & Rebecca Needham
Manager Response: Wow! What a great review and thank you very much for your kind words! I have shared all of your comments with the staff and we truly look forward to having you return to the Peacock Suites in the future!

Summary: The Peacock Suites was very clean.  It is just another hotel room not  a condo.  We had a wardrobe for a closet - not enough room to hang all of our  shirts in.  I don't know how 4 or 5 people could stay in one of these.  There would be no room for suitcases.  On the plus side, the front desk people were very nice,the valet person was also nice but the daily $10 fee a bit much.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to leave us such a detailed review. We're so pleased you found our staff throughout the hotel friendly and helpful, although the room was not up to your expectations.   We do hope you will consider visiting the Peacock Suites again!

Summary Heading: This is a hotel not a timeshare
Summary: We exchanged our timeshare through Interval International for a week at Peacock Suites. The photos online seem a little misleading. We basically had a room that I would compare with an Embassy suites. Two queen beds in one room and a small second room with half size fridge, microwave, and toaster. The swimming pool is about the size of some resort hot tubs and located underneath the hotel. Not inside per se but no sunny exposure. The rooms were clean and the beds were comfortable but the bathroom area was very small (just a tub and toilet) with a sink directly inside the entry way. The location is convenient to Disney Land. My wife and I walked several times in about 15 minutes. Plenty of restuarants available nearby but expect to wait. I gave the resort two stars because it is
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a detailed review. Though we are pleased you found our location convenient for your trip into Disneyland, we are concerned when we fall short of expectations. However, we appreciate hearing both the negative and positive aspects of your stay and look to these to help us move forward.   We hope to have an opportunity to welcome you back again someday!

Summary: We listened to TripAdvisors reviews and asked for a room on the top (fourth) floor, facing Disney.  We got half of it.  The view out the window was of the parking lot.  The other side of the hall got to look at another hotel.  But the sun roof was excellent for viewing the Disney fireworks every night.  The valet service at $10 per day turned out to be very convenient, as people were coming and going constantly in a very small area and holding up traffic at times.  The valets were very pleasant and cheerful, as were all the hotel clerks.  The rooms were small but clean and comfortable.    I only have one "points off" remark, and the longer our stay, the worse I felt about it.  Smokers are banished to one area only on the entire property, at the furthest corner of the parking
Manager Response: Thank you taking the time to make a comment about your recent stay, we are happy to hear it was enjoyable. Your comments mean a lot to us and we pride ourselves on listening to our guests and continuing to strive to provide the best experience possible. I hope we are able to accomodate you during your future visits into Anaheim.

Summary: We are a young family of five and stayed for just over two weeks. The lobby staff were extremely helpful and friendly. Our young boys loved the free Halloween candy in the lobby. Loved the location too Anaheim Garden Walk and that the ART shuttles stopped right outside! Perfect for getting to Disney. They even gave us a room with a view to the Disneyland Fireworks. The room size was perfect for the amount of time we actually spent in it. The beds were very comfortable - even the pull out sofa was extremely comfortable to sleep on.   Only gripe is the cleaning staff! They didn't dust once during our stay and would often not clean the room on scheduled days until quite late in the evening. Sometimes they didn't replace tableware in the correct amount either. (5 of us so needed 5
Manager Response: Thank you for including the Peacock Suites on your family vacation to Disneyland.  We appreciate your candid feedback that assists us in focusing our energies and continuing to improve product and services.   We look forward to seeing your family again when you return to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Nice sized suite for our group
Summary: Room was nice and big with plenty of bed space.  Small kitchenette with plenty of supplies. Outdoor 'games room' had a pool table, ping pong table, tv and vending machines.  Kids loved them all AND the pool.  Us adults hung out at the tables with our drinks.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Peacock Suites, we would like to thank you for taking the time to provide this review! We're glad you were able to enjoy our recreational area and the pool. We hope you consider visiting again!!

Summary: My husband and I are in our mid 60's and we've just had a lovely time share week here. We have been to Anaheim before and have visited Disneyland etc so we weren't interested in visiting them again. Instead we chose to drive down to the Californian beaches and enjoy the dining experience and beautiful views. The unit we stayed in was on the 4th floor, and it had everything we required, except a view! We both slept soundly every night in comfortable beds with lovely soft pillows. My husband enjoys his early morning swims and exercise routines, but unfortunately the fitness centre leaves a lot to be desired. The pool is quite small but adequate and the 2 spas were enjoyed by most visitors. The $10 rate for Valet parking is reasonable and the boys did a fantastic job parking and
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind recommendation and review. We know you have a choice when visiting the Orange County area and do appreciate that you chose the Peacock Suites during your vacation. We look forward to seeing you again when you return to Anaheim!

Summary: The room is an oversized hotel room with a kitchenette, which is just fine for couples, but would be very cramp for a family of any size.  The room was very clean and had nice amenities.  The hotel is close to Disneyland and has a city run shuttle that runs to and from Disneyland about every 20 mins. with a stop in front of the hotel; the cost of a shuttle ticket is $5.00 per person per day.  Also, lots of nice places to eat nearby.  If you have a car you will expand your options.  One drawback for us is that the hotel has no self-parking and that its all vallet parking at $10.00 a day plus tax.  The other drawback is that there is a Wyndham timeshare counter in the lobby trying to sell you one of their timeshares.  It's not high pressure, but they still try to you into one of
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a detailed review. Your concers are certainly legitimate and have been addressed with our Supervisors and Managers. We constantly strive to provide exceptional service and are sincerely conerned when we fall short of expectations.   We hope to have an opportunity to welcome you back again someday.

Summary: This is a good choice for staying with the family at Disney. The resorts that are close to Disney are a mixed bag at best. Peacock suites has very friendly staff, but the rooms are a bit noisy. We used the noise machine app on my iPhone to cover noise from other rooms. Walking distance means 15 min. The shuttle will get you there in the same amount of time but saves your feet the trouble. If you are going to come back to the resort for a mid day break, the shuttle is worth the $5 day pass. All in all a nice option especially because the room has a small kitchenette for food and drink items.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to express your thoughts about your stay at the Peacock Suites!   We are always delighted to hear good things about our staff members, but are concerned about the noise level you experienced.  We do appreciate your feedback as we look to reviews to guide us on, not only what we are doing well, but what we can do to continue to imporove our services and amenities.

Summary: My family stayed here during our visit to Disneyland and other local attractions.  Immediately following check-in we were chatted up by a timeshare sales person who didn't seem to understand "no thanks."  We avoided the lobby for the remainder of the trip.  The rooms are fine, though perhaps on the small side for four people.  The "resort" has a pool and game area, but it was constantly filled with unsupervised kids.  The parking lot is mandatory valet, and the wait times varied between 2-10 minutes.  Disneyland is about a 20-25 minute brisk walk.  There is a shuttle available for a fee, and though it was usually crowded you will get to the park faster.  Despite some shortcomings, this place is clean and the front desk staff and housekeepers are very nice.  It wouldn't be one of
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about your stay at the Peacock Suites. While we are disappointed to hear that you felt your stay was only mediocre, we appreciate your comments. We also appreciate the kind words about the staff and serivce you experienced.  We hope that you will consider coming back to stay with us another time to have what we hope would be a more positive experience.

Summary: It was not a good experience. On Friday, I ask the front desk to bring me coffee, more pillows and blankets.  It took them 4 hours.  Then, when we went to Disneyland on Saturday we left the do not disturb sign off the door so they could clean our room.  They never came to clean.  When we called them about the issue, the lady argued with me.  I told her if she could at least bring towels and that I would dump my own trash and dishes for coffee the next morning. She said ok and just brought me towels.I had to dump my own trash and wash my own dishes to use them the next day. When we complained again to the front desk, they said sorry and that was it.  A manger by the name of Daisy did call us on Monday and asked us what happened.  I told her the whole story as listed above and she
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at the Peacock Suites. While we are disappointed to hear that your experience fell short of the expections that we set for every guest, we appreciate your comments.We have taken your comments seriously and have passed them on to the managers whose departments were mentioned.

Summary: Coming in to the hotel, We were greeted by the valet driver and helped us out with our car. $11 per night is actually not bad compared to the valet service here in San Francisco. Anyways, check in procedure was pretty fast and very helpful with providing information and locations of the area.   Headed to our room and the whole place was unexpectedly big. It was big enough for two people. Having a microwave in the room was great plus.   After being in the room for a couple of hours, we heard someone coming in the room but we had the latch on the door so if anyone comes in, it gets stopped by this metal lock. All of a sudden we hear loud bangs on our door and I come rushing out of the bedroom and opened the door,It was their houseman. He informed me that their were guest that
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us and other guests know about your recent experience at the Peacock Suites. It is unfortunate that you did not receive a pleasant experience on your first night. We have addressed the issue to the Guest Services Department as well as the Housekeeping Department. We appreciate hearing both the negative and positive aspects of your stay and look to these reviews to to help us move forward.  If your travels bring you back to Anaheim in the future, we would like to hear from you and have the opportunity to have you experience the Peacock Suites one more time!

Summary: Convenient location to disneyland. You can either walk-about 15 minutes or take the shuttle to the park. Shuttle is $5.00 for an all day pass. We stayed in a two bedroom suite. Very comfortable!  The room was exceptionally clean. Nice to come back to after a long day at the park. We did not notice an excessive amount of noise.  Staff were extremely helpful and pleasant.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the outstanding review. We appreciate your kind words about the staff and service you recieived during your visit to the property!  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary Heading: Suites hotel five minutes from The Mouse; fastest valet ever
Summary: I had a quiet room not on Anaheim Blvd. but really far from the elevator.  Don't expect a room with a view unless you get a room from which you can see the Disneyland fireworks.  (You can also see them from the sundeck on the top floor.) The resort had few amenities, but I'm sure most people come for the proximity to the places to go and things to do.  The shuttle to the park is $5 per day and picks up right by the driveway.  We had a one-bedroom suite that was tastefully decorated and really very comfortable.  It's on the small side and could've used a second luggage rack.  The layout is unusual in that the bathroom sink and vanity are in the foyer as soon as you walk into the room.  (I have a lot of "stuff," so it always looked messy.) There was no fan in the bathroom, it was
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to comment on your stay at the Peacock Suites. We appreciate your thoughts, and your concerns have been addressed with our Guest Services agents and supervisors. We are pleased that you found our location and valet service convenient as well,  and we will continue to strive to improve on the issues you did experience. Thank you again for taking the time to leave us such a detailed review! We hope you consider us again on your next trip to Disneyland.

Summary: This place is small but elegant. Great place to sleep and eat when running around Disney. Help staff is wonderful. Room was clean. The breakfast was very tasty and sitting outside was a unique twist. I loved the valet parking once we parked the rest of trip was used by shuttle.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Great place except for one huge problem!!!!
Summary: We stayed here for a week at the end of August. The staff were excellent, very friendly and went out their way to make sure everything was ok. After reading reviews, I had requested a high room facing Disney, unfortunately this didn't happen and we were on the first floor overlooking the car park! Apart from the view, we were very impressed with our room, very stylish and comfortable. Housekeeping were excellent, anything needed was brought to the room immediately then reception would call to make sure   all was satisfactory. The HUGE  problem with the Peacock Suites was discovered at night time and early morning, the walls are so thin that you could hear the television of the next room, you could hear your neighbours conversations sometimes and one morning at 5.15am we were
Manager Response: Though we are pleased you found our guestrooms comfotable and stylish, we are concerned about your feedback about the noise level. Our Front Office manager is addressing all the issues you encountered promptly as it is of vital importance. We appreciate your candid feedback that assists us in focusing our energies and continuing to imporove product and services. We hope to have an opportunity to welcome you back again someday!

Summary: Friendly staff, room had large sitting area, 2 TV's, coffee makes, fridge, and microwave. Hotel is near many fine restaurants ( can walk to), within 7 miles of Disney Land, Museums, and Medieval Times.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and compliments to the staff, it is always the goal for all guests to be comfortable and I am glad to see we were able to achieve that for you and your family.  We look forward to your next stay with us during a future vacation to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Peacock review in flying high colors!
Summary: The rooms were beautiful and tastefully furnished.Everything we needed was there, right down to 2 TV sets, coffee, coffee pot, microwave, plus the popcorn! Fridge, tableware and utensils were provided. The customer service was outstanding.They recommended great eateries and gave us 15% off at a fantastic restaurant.We were at their resort in Anaheim, and watched Disneyland fireworks from the roof. Wonderful valet service, plus our suite was available about 15 minutes before check-in time. My friend was celebrating his birthday and they sent up a balloon and small birthday cake!
Manager Response: Thank you for your outstanding review regarding your recent visit to the Peacock Suites. It is always great to hear that we exceeded your expectations. We look forward to having you stay with us in the future!  Thank you again for your review!

Summary: Last year's trip was when we saw Shell Vacations was acquired by Wyndham. In hindsight, the remodel from the year made sense. We were disappointed to learn the free breakfast was discontinued. They turned the old breakfast area into a sales area where they invite your group for breakfast or lunch. This already left a sour taste in our mouths. They took a perk away we used to get that you could get at so many other Disneyland area hotels. Worse, we didn't get to Disney California Adventure until noon because Shell took much longer than the 60 minutes they claimed it would take. Their sausage made my dad sick and he had to spend the rest of the day at the hospital. Why oh why do my parents have Shell? We stayed again this year. Disney messed up our ticket situation and we had to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at the Peacock Suites! While we are disappointed to hear that you felt your stay was only mediocre, we appreciate your comments. We have taken your comments seriously and have passed them on to the managers whose departments were mentioned.

Summary: We stayed at the Peacock Suites at the beginning of August for 4 nights. We really enjoyed our stay there. The property was clean. The rooms were clean and recently refurbished.  There is not a lot of sound proofing between rooms so you can hear others above you but it wasn't really bad.  The staff was very friendly and helpful. We did not get the shuttle to Disneyland because there were so many of us it was cheaper to park the car. But the park is really close and it is an easy walk.  We used the BBQ facilities 3 of the 4 nights. The BBQ is cleaned nightly and the staff can provide tools for you to use.  The community area by the BBQs is a bit noisy because it is also by the pool so we ate dinner either in our room or on the roof top. The roof top is really lovely.  We watched
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your comments and for giving an honest review. Feedback these days is priceless and without it, we cannot continue to grow and get better at what we do. I wanted to apologize for the noise you experienced during your stay as it is always our goal to create a relaxing, yet exciting environment for our guests.  We are very glad that you enjoyed your stay overall, though. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope to see you again on your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: Advice for those considering Peacock Suites:  DO NOT assume that your room will be ready at 3:00 p.m. the room we had was available much later. Every day that we stayed the maids were still working well past 5:00 p.m.  THOROUGHLY INSPECT YOUR VEHICLE after the REQUIRED valet “service.” Our van was damaged, but they denied that they were responsible. I then went into the parking garage where I found my van parked across the dividing lines, and five different places where the supporting posts had been scraped by vehicles.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a detailed review. I want to assure you that we have addressed your concerns. We constantly strive to provide excellent service and are sincerely concerned that we fell short of your expectations. I would love to discuss the aforementioned situation in regards to your vehicle if you would like to contact  the hotel directly at 714-535-8255.   Thank you again for your feedback and we hope to have an opportunity to turn your experience around the next time your travels bring you into Anaheim.

Summary: We had a one bedroom on the 4th floor.  Never noisy.  Nice room but smallish.  Could see the firworks from my room every night.  Loved the sun deck but it was mostly too hot or rainy.  Very small pool on 1st floor with other amenities, they have have made the most with the space available.    If you have a car the valet parking is a pain. We were doing a lot of different things but if you are just doing Disney you really don't need a car. Great staff!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to post your comments about the Peacock Suites! We appreciate both the positive and the negative comments as we strive to continue to progress as a team.  While we understand the frustration with Valet, we hope you understand why we have the Valet service since you have witnessed our parking lot and the parking around the property. It was added as a way to alleviate what could be a difficult parking situation for our guests.   Thank you again for your comments and we hope to see you again on any further visits to Anaheim!

Summary: This hotel should close down... Because the staff likes to threaten guests and it is now are near Disneyland p. There is nothing to do around that is kid or family friendly do not stay here of you don't want to be on great danger and in total boring mode.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to put your thoughts about your stay at the Peacock Suites into writing! It is unfortunate that your experience fell short of the expectations that we set for every guest.  If your travels bring you back to Anaheim in the future, we would like to have you back with us to give you the experience that you deserve!

Summary: Peacock Suites has been beautifully remodeled. I was pleasantly surprised how exceptionly comfortable the new mattresses are. My hips have pressure point issues on most mattresses but not this time. As another review said...I wanted to take it home with me!!! The staff and valet staff were personable, friendly and provided A+++ service. Stayed for 3 weeks and hated to leave. Will definitely stay again!!!!!
Manager Response: Wow! What a great review and thank you very much for your kind words! I have shared all of your comments with the staff and we look forward to serving you and your family again in the future!

Summary: Nice, spacious rooms. We had a 2 bedroom with 7 of us and didn't feel cramped at all as some other reviews mentioned. Beds were very comfortable. DirectTV on 3 TV's was nice. Request a room with a sink if possible. Can't fathom why rooms would have dishes but no way to clean them. Check-in was okay, Stephanie was very pleasant. The computers were kinda slow so it took a while to get our keys and be on our way. Which, by the way after check in you're forced to step over to the "welcome center" which is where they start their timeshare pitch. It's annoying and after a long day of travel it was the last thing I wanted to be faced with. They do provide a map of the area with eating/shopping options which was helpful. Parking is valet only at $10 per day, per vehicle. I'd rather park
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed your stay at the Peacock Suites! Thank you for taking the time to put your experience on Trip Advisor!  While we understand the frustration you experienced with the parking situation, we hope that you will understand why it is done since you have witnessed the actual parking around the property. The Valet service was added to help alleviate what could be a dreadful parking situation and to assist all of our guests with an easy parking solution. Thank you again for your comments! We look forward to having you return to the Peacock Suites in the future!

Summary: Stayed in July 2015 in a 1 bedroom suite.  Rooms were refurbished since my last stay here.  King bed was very comfortable and the staff was exceptional.  I have to say that the kitchen area is severely lacking when compared to normal kitchens and the area is directly next to where TV is located so a bit cramped.  No sink, no dishwasher, no stove.  It was nice to have a microwave and coffeemaker but strange to place dirty dishes in the hallway.  While we were responsible for our "inventory," dishes were not replaced unless you called for replacements.  We were was concerned that some dishes and flatware could go missing and we would be accountable, but that never happened.  Also, the walk to the park takes more like 25 minutes of normal walking and not the reported 15 - unless
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us and other guests know about your recent experience at the Peacock Suites!  It is unfortunate that your experience fell short of the expectations that we set for each and every guest. We appreciate hearing both the negative and positive aspects of your stay and refer to these reviews to help us to move forward.  If your travels bring you back to Anaheim in the future, we would like to hear from you and have the opportunity to have you experience the Peacock Suites one more time.

Summary: This is a very recently refurbished hotel; everything works, is nice and clean and everything seems to be well taken care of. However, traveling with family (wife and 12&10-year olds) the rooms are tiny and there's simply not enough closet or luggage space in them. We stayed in a one king/one sofa bed room and were told that the two queen/one sofa bed rooms would have been bigger. The rooms at the street side were also quite noisy; the Interstate next door is not too noisy, but the smaller street has a lot of night time traffic. The room was also cleaned up only twice during our stay; this was causing things like running out of toilet paper and taking our food trash out ourselves before it starts smelling. we did some cooking ourselves (breakfast oatmeal and coffee); the room
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to write a review about your recent stay.  We’re sad to hear that the layout of the room wasn’t conducive for your family of 4.   If you are planning another vacation, I would definitely suggest one of our beautiful 2 or 3 bedroom suites.  As a timeshare resort, we clean the rooms after the 4th day, but are available to deliver any extra amenities that are requested during your stay.  We hope that you will consider staying with us again in the near future.

Summary: We saved up to take a real Honeymoon on a different anniversary and we went to Disneyland. My parents gave us their timeshare and we stayed at Peacock Suites. We got a shuttle from the airport straight to their front door, so we had no car.  Peacock suites is very fancy for us average folk, a place we would not be able to afford otherwise. The room was clean and spacious and very cozy. We had a room in the center, so it was quite loud.  The roof deck was awesome for fireworks (we did not watch them there, but checked it out real quick.) The pool area was kind of disappointing, very small. They had a neat game area and you could rent board games, play pool and ping pong or BBQ. Staff was very friendly and went out of their way to get us a can opener from the kitchen and deliver
Manager Response: We are honored that out of all the resorts in the area you chose to stay with us to celebrate your Honeymoon!  Thank you for the kind remarks that you mentioned about the staff.  We are thrilled that the location and surrounding restaurants were convenient to you during your stay.  Congratulations and again, thank you for staying with us!

Summary: My family stayed here for a few nights in a 3 bedroom condo. The hotel was very close to Disneyland and had a shuttle that took about 5 minutes to get to the park.
