It is just my wife and I but we did a two room suite for only a few points more and made it very comfy cozy having our own bedroom and bathroom lol! The amenities are good with kitchenettes, comfy beds, and basic continental breakfast (hotel even has a gift shop that has basic Disney stuff cheaper than the parks). Pool is small but adequate with two jacuzzis (wish they did a last hour for adults only because not liking jacuzzi time with hoards of kids). Since Wyndham has taken over they no longer have housekeeping unless you ask for it (poor service since this isn't explained at check in unless u read the little sign at the door). No fault of theirs since this is new, and when complained about, they
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great room, excellent service, outside grounds need some work
Summary: The room itself was a bit small but well-kept and decorated although the layout is a bit odd as the bathroom sink is the first thing one walks into entering the room. The service was great, everyone there was attentive. The walls between rooms are paper-thin as we were woken up by the alarm going off in the next room. The main downfall of this place is its outside /public areas- the hallways makes one feel like one is staying at a motel due to these being open to the outside, staircases and elevators are outside and run-down. The location is good and best part is that it is the 1st pick-up and drop-off of the ART route that passes by there so it's easy to get to Disney, etc. Overall a good hotel but needs work on its facade.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Every time we go to Disneyland we have stayed at Peacock Suites.  The staff is very accommodating and there are daily activities for the kids.  It is a little ways away from Disneyland but not too far; we usually walk instead of taking the shuttle.  I wish the kitchen area was bigger and in one of the rooms that we stayed in, it didn't have a sink (except for the bathroom).  The rooms are spacious and the pull out couches are very comfortable.  Whenever we have gone to the pool it hasn't been crowded.  There is a large area for grilling and meeting up with family.  I highly recommend Peacock Suites!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good for a shower and a snooze
Summary: No frills property with mandatory $10./day valet parking. The unit was adequate.  There is a small kitchenette, but we basically used our room for sleeping and showering.   Free continental breakfast consists of mostly breads and coffee, juice and cereal.    Overall, the staff was very confused.  It makes me think that they don't get any training.  When we drove up, the valet said for me to give him my keys.  The next day when I needed my car, the other valet had a really hard time finding my keys.  The first guy never gave me my parking receipt.  Finally, the second valet just had me look at all the keys to find mine.    The woman who checked us in gave us two keys, only one worked.  While we were struggling with our non-working key, we saw another guest in the hall who was
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great value - will definitely be back!
Summary: Pro's: Great breakfast - includes; dry cereal, waffles, toast, bagles, donuts, eggs, yogurt, fresh fruit, and a variety of beverages. Great value! Pro: This is our 2nd stay at this hotel - we had a 1 bdrm first time and 2 bdrm this time.  Both are spacious. Pro:  Clean and updated property/rooms. Pro: Location: Approx 15 min walk to Disney (or you can shuttle), 5 minute drive to Target, Grocery Store (Food for Less on Katella is reasonable), 25 minute drive to great beaches, 10 minute drive to great shopping (Westminster Mall was great!) Pro: Deck:  Quiet, clean and well maintained. Pro: Pool:  It's small but we liked that as it never got crowded nor noisy.  Con- Very few cons as this is a great property.  But it was disappointing to see guests being able to smoke on the
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff at PS was wonderful!  Karan checked us and and made everything so easy. Traveling with several young children is not easy, however, he made sure we got in our rooms quickly! The kids checked out some games and DVD's. Housecleaning, electricians, and valet were all very friendly and took care of our requests immediately. Can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We just stayed for one night luckily.  They put us in a room facing several highways.  It was VERY loud all the time.  We were going to Disney and either had to take a shuttle there or drive.  The pool was tiny (most pools at homes are bigger) for the size of the hotel.  The front door does not have any automatic opener, which can be a pain then your hands are full of bags/children (and they didn't bother to hold open the door either).  The front desk staff took a very long time to check us in.  We arrived around 6pm and she had to search for like 10 minutes to find us a room that was ready.  The room itself had a very small living room area and a very small bedroom.  The bed was comfortable but the loud traffic noise made it very difficult to sleep.  The breakfast was just sad.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Oh this place was a little beauty! The staff were so so friendly and the rooms were awesome, well our room was we didnt see any others. We were only there two nights but it was great, great location, great service and cheap price tag. Wonderful stay.. thanks Peacock Suites!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was our first time at this property. We enjoyed it as much as the other Shell Vacations properties we have visited. We had a two-bedroom which was very clean and quiet. The only complaint, if you can call it that, is the lack of hooks for clothing/towels. There's no where to hang your stuff! The free continental breakfast had a decent selection. This area was also kept clean although I feel a dress code for guests would be appropriate (ie. no shoes, no shirt, no service!). Amazing that people think it's ok to walk around a public area with nothing on their feet! The pool is on the small size but heated (which the kids liked) and good if you want to get out of the sun. ART shuttle service outside the front doors was extremely convenient and a safe way to travel to and from
Manager Response: none

Summary: Have stayed at this hotel several times and always enjoy myself. Close to Disneyland, nice staff, comfy beds in large rooms.Right on an ART stop which makes going to Disneyland a breeze without having to drive.  Love the pool. Love that the pool is covered for the most part. Would reccomend.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We booked this hotel because is it close to disney, and yes: we went to Knott's Berry Farm instead...awesome!  The suites have two rooms and are newly renovated. Nice furniture and two big screen LCD's. He sleeping comfort is fine, good beds,  Bathroom is also new, and all the needed stuff was there. Parking was only as valet, and costs 10 dollar per night. The breakfast, well, skip it.... Cheap food and disposable plates, knifes etc. (They claim to go green...yeah....) Highchairs for kids are stickey, not so pleasant. Like many pools in the USA, this one was also small, creepy and really smelly (high chlorine)  The water in the hot tub seemd yellowish, eeeeeek!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed one week and loved it. I only gave four star over all for a few minor things. First called once I booked in August to request a 1 bedroom with king and called a few more times and once we checked in they gave us a two bedded queen room. We got in late and were able to see fireworks from window in our room. The housekeeping changed policy mid week while we were there and we were not told so we had expect housekeeping to come and they did not. The hotel is a bit away from disneyland but art stops right out front and its the first stop so that makes it not so bad. The breakfast is from 7a-10a and its very basic but enough to get you going. Sugar works in there and she was such a pleasure to deal with. The room had a sink when you first walked in and the bathroom with toilet
Manager Response: none

Summary: Thankyou Thankyou to the wonderful Paula and the team. On arrival all the way from Ireland such a treat.....valet parking! A beautiful suite with jacuzzi bath. Wow. Attention to detail and friendliness made our stay a home away from home.We will defintely be back.
Manager Response: What a great review and thank you very much for your kind words!  I have shared your comments with Paula and the rest of the Peacock Suites staff!  We truly look forward to serving you and your family again in the future!

Summary: We spent three days and two nights at this hotel, April 26-28. The lobby was tiny, and mandatory valet parking was levied, but we knew about this ahead of time from reading reviews. We arrived early and were able to park the vehicle and have our bags held by bell services. This was a plus. The concierge was very knowledgeable and handed us some great local information, as well as an opportunity to listen to their sales pitch for Shell Vacations, 90 minutes for $100 Disney Dollars. We declined and were not pressured. We utilized the Anaheim Resort Transportation to get to Disneyland and back. There was an ART kiosk in front of the hotel. As the first stop on the route, seating was never a problem en route. We came back after 4pm to check in and received our requested room area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your honest review.  We are always looking for ways to improve the guest experience and we appreciate you taking the time to complete a Trip Advisor review!  We hope to see you again soon and thank you again for your feedback!

Summary: We have stayed at Peacock Suites twice in the last six years.  Both of our visits have been wonderful.  Our first visit we had a two bedroom suite with 6 people, and it was perfect.  This year, we stayed in the one bedroom with 5 and although it was tight, it was perfect.  The quality of service at Peacock Suites is second to none, the entire staff is incredibly friendly!  We absolutely loved our stay, and will stay there again as soon as we have enough points!!  We would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at the Peacock Suites again!  We are very grateful to have such loyal guests!  We appreciate the kind review, and look forward to having you stay with us again int he future!

Summary: Peacock Suites is our home every time we go to Disneyland/California Adventure. My kids ( 8 and 5 years of age) love this wonderful place. The furnitures and bedding sheets that this Suite use feels like we are at home. The staff offers over the top customer service. Excellent place excellent staff.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you feel that the Peacock Suites is your home away from home!  Thank you so much for taking the time to complete a review on Tripadvisor!

Summary: we recently stayed at The Peacock Suites and found them a great place to stay...great value for money, nice clean rooms, right in the hub of Disneyland area..the ART bus which goes direct to Disneyland stops right outside the hotel and is aso value for money...staff are  friendly and helpful and if you are lucky enough to meet Bobby at reception, he is extremely friendly and helpful..we highly recommend this hotel without hesitation
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback regarding your recent stay.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed your time here enough to refer friends and family, and we look forward to serving you in the future!

Summary: We stayed at Peacock Suites from April 6 - 10.  One Bedroom King with separate living area, with a comfortable pull out couch for our daughter.  There was a small fridge, microwave, sink, and dishes with was a nice touch.  The rooms were in really good shape and the King Bed was very comfortable.  Had a corner unit, so it was very quiet.  The complimentary breakfast was varied with your basic starter stuff.  All we needed before heading to the Park.  We used the ART to take us right to the Disney bus drop off area.  It was great, and saved a lot of walking.  The transit pricing was good too. Having the transit stop right in front of the hotel was fantastic.  It was about a 20 minute walk to Disneyland but we used the ART most of the time.  There was a valet parking fee of 11.00
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the comments about your recent stay at the Peacock Suites!  We are so pleased to hear that you and your family enjoyed your visit and that you would plan to return for another stay!  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: The continental breakfast is much better than others I have been to - donuts, cereal, oatmeal, hb eggs (cold), bagels, toaster waffles, milk coffee. Beds are soft and comfy (organic cotton) and the room was nice. I read that it was recently renovated.  The pool and hot tubs are small and smell strongly of chlorine - we didn't get in. Front office staff was friendly and attentive. However, the cleaning crew acted like they had pickles for breakfast - not friendly. We were there four days - it is within walking distance to the Cheesecake Factory, and other dining options.  (Pizza delivery options were slim, and pizza was not very good. When traveling with two teens, that can be important.) My son wanted more blankets and pillows, and called the front desk.  Extra items were at our
Manager Response: Though we are pleased you found our location and overall guestrooms comfortable and convenient, we are concerned about your feedback about the guest service of our housekeeping staff.  Our Housekeeping Manager is addressing the service issues promptly as it is of vital importance-- truly one of our greatest assets is our tremendous staff and their commitment to customer service.  We appreciate your candid feedback that assists us in focusing our energies and continuing to improve our product and services.

Summary: This hotel ticks all the boxes for your visit to Disneyland. It has all the basics with friendly and helpful staff. The breakfast is basic and ok but could improve the selection. We walked to Disneyland everyday which was only a 15 minute walk but most other guests preferred to rest their legs and catch the public shuttle buses which are frequent and stop right out the front of the hotel. There is a ticket dispenser for the shuttles outside reception. The area seemed pretty safe to walk around at night and there are plenty of family restaurants within a short walk to chose from. Anaheim baseball stadium is also nearby. You can buy park hopper tickets from the front desk which saves you lining up at the Disney ticket stalls. Our only complaint was the lack of soundproofing. We
Manager Response: As always, we truly appreciate when our guests take time out of their schedules to write comments about their stay here at the Peacock Suites!  Your comments are no exception and we are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your overall visit with us!

Summary: My husband & I stayed here for our trip to Disneyland, Univ Studio and California Adventure. We are SVC members and very easy to book. Room large, clean and remodeled. Mini kitchenette very convenient. Pool great for kids if you have them.  We'll return with our grandkids, (and their parents). The ART bus is very convenient. We bought a 3 day ART pass because we had a Disney City Pass which is 2 days Disneyland and 1 day at Calif adventure. The ART bus comes every 30 minutes and there's only one stop before the main Disney gate. You definitely want to take this bus and not drive because the parking lots are FAR away from the gate. The breakfast at Peacock suites is adequate and they do have fresh fruit, Yoplait yogurt, etc.  All the staff is very friendly & helpful. Nice little
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a comment about your recent stay.  We are happy to hear it was enjoyable.  Your comments mean a lot to us and we pride ourselves on listening to our guests and continuing to strive to provide the best experience possible.  I hope we are able to accommodate you during your future visits to Anaheim.

Summary: After reading many positive reviews here about Peacock Suites, my husband and I booked our 6 night stay a few months ago. We saved by pre-paying in full. This trip was a special one for us- our 33rd wedding anniversary, and my first trip to Disneyland. This has been a dream of mine since I was a little girl, and my husband gave me the trip as an anniversary gift. The staff at Peacock Suites went above and beyond for us- when we entered the room there were balloons, roses and a gift bag! We were stunned! It made the long, bumpy flight from PA dissapear. As we took in our surroundings, we were so pleased with the room. The decor is upscale and comfortable. The room was spotless. There was complimentary water and soda in the fridge. The shower was wonderful- a rainfall showerhead!
Manager Response: We truly appreciate when our guests take time out of their schedules to write comments about their stay here at the Peacock Suites!  Thank you for allowing us to be a part of your anniversary celebration! I will make sure to share your comments with our staff, especially Sandra and Maria.  Thank you again, and we hope to see you and your husband again soon!

Summary Heading: Great place to travel with a large group
Summary: I was traveling with a school group, and the Peacock Suites really took care of us.  They put even more thought into our reservations than I did--making sure that boys and girls were in separate locations, making sure that none of our groups had adjoining rooms, etc.  They also were very helpful with finding restaurants for us and other necessities.  The rooms are comfortable and large, and very economical because they can sleep six.  The students and chaperones alike were comfortable and really happy with the accommodations.  The locations is great, because it is within walking distance to Disneyland.  We are planning to take the same trip next year, and rather than shopping around, we just plan on returning to the Peacock Suites, because we had such a great experience!
Manager Response: We wanted to take a minute to say thank you for putting your thoughts about your group's stay at the Peacock Suites in writing!  We are happy to hear that you and your group enjoyed the visit and plan to stay here again the next time you are in Anaheim!  Thank you again!!

Summary: A Shell vacations property that was very easy to book, the location is super and the staff has been excellent. Breakfast is adequate to get your day started. Rooms are spacious and kitchen facilities are a plus. Very convenient whenever we are in the LA area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is one of my favorite properties in Anaheim. Not only is it affordable, but the rooms have been newly remodeled. It looks like a cute boutique hotel. The front staff is very friendly and I always feel safe on the property. They even have breakfast which is included in their rate. The only down side is that the only option for parking is valet, which means you have to add on an additional $12 per night to your room.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that you were able to enjoy one of our renovated suites.  I will be sharing your positive feedback with the management team.  Thank you again!  We look forward to having you stay with us in the future!

Summary: My family and I came here last December and I have to admit..it wasn't that bad of a place. Great renovations, and it was really quiet, which made it relaxing. The valet was also always quick and polite to get our car. The breakfast was convenient..not too much selection but enough. Great places that were walking distance away.  However,..I did not enjoy the beds too well. They were very stiff and contained only a sheet and a tiny comforter used better for decoration. I much rather have slept on the couch! I would've given the place five stars if the beds were better.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest review.  I will pass on your comments to our management team for discussion, and hope that you will give us a second chance in the future!

Summary: Excellent place to stay.  Close to Disneyland and buses to all other tourist attractions.  Big rooms and friendly staff.  The breakfast could be improved by adding more fresh fruit, but for the price.  Amazing deal.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and compliments to the staff, it is always the goal for all of our guests to be comfortable and we are happy to see we were able to achieve that for you and your family!

Summary Heading: 1 mile walk to Disneyland or take the ART Shuttle
Summary: We stayed at the Peacock Suites for a week (through an I.I. trade) the week before Christmas 2012.  The trip was enjoyable and we are booked for another week in September 2013.  I was impressed by the FRIENDLY and helpful staff.  They were great and went the extra mile to make us comfortable.  Our room was decorated in a very fun and modern decor.  My only complaint and reason for 4 out of 5 stars is the size of the room.  It was a bit small considering we needed to put 2 pack n plays in the front room with the couch, and had a double stroller as well.  The Valet parking was fast and the employees were friendly. I didn't mind the Valet fee as it was much less than I have paid elsewhere.  The bed was SO comfortable.  I think it might have been a Tempurpedic type of bed.  The sofa
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your detailed review of the Peacock Suites!  We always appreciate the time our guests take out of their busy schedule to share their thoughts!  We look forward to seeing you soon, and thank you again!

Summary: We usually stay right across the street from Disney, this time the price was right and by recommendation from my nephew we decided to stay at Peacock Suites. The staff was friendly. The rooms (we booked 2) both had kitchenettes with dinning table . But the highlight was when we checked out we were running late to the airport an forgot a bag in the closet an never realized it until we were at the airport so we called an left message with night manager well got a call next day from the house keeping manager an they had it and put it in the mail !!!  With so much negativity that you hear about some hotels and motels its nice to find one that was definitely positive!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words and compliments to the staff and their training.  It has always been and will remain our main focus to service our Guests and Owners to the best of our ability!  We look forward to seeing you and your family again on future visits to Anaheim!

Summary: I enjoyed myself immensely.   I was on a multi-purpose trip with business conferences being in close proximatey in surrounding areas just before and after my days at The Peaock Suites which were well needed relaxation days.  I give 2 thumbs up to the resort for it's clean sunny rooms and tasteful well decorated functional suites.  The bed and bedroom were comfortable and the kitchen was user friendly yet had an elegant feeling. The incuded continiental breakfast was located in a roomy, sunny, cheery section of the resort with plenty of seating making it a very pleasant,relaxing, and a convenient way to start each day.  The staff there and throughout the resort were very friendly and helpful.  The breakfast contained a very nice selection of items and serve yourself portions.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Peacock Suites!  We are always thankful to our guests who react positively to their stay and want others to know about it!  We have passed on your comments to our staff to read so that they know they are appreciated in their contributions to make sure you felt welcomed and comfortable during your stay.    Thank you again and we look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: Peacock suites were great lovely rooms 2 tvs roomy clean and easy to walk every where would go back anytime.  Could walk to Disneyland.  Lots of place to eat in walking distance.  7 eleven on corner bus pckup out the front good breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We realize you have many options when it comes to lodging and we appreciate your choosing the Peacock Suites!

Summary: This hotel is very close to disneyland. You can either do a 15min walk or pay a fee for a shuttle. We had a king size room. The room is not as spacious but the pull out couch in the living room was pretty comfy for the kids to sleep in. They have two flat screen tv, one in the bedroom and one in the living room. The kitchen consisted of a good size table for four, microwave and and a mini ref. and of course coffeemaker. They also provide utensils such as plates, cups, spoons and dish detergent. The kitchen does not have a sink, you have to use the bathroom sink for everything. The bathroom was a good size, shower was great. The bed were comfy and the whole room was pretty clean. We stayed five days and we opt out the daily cleaning and they'll give you a 5% discount, it's called
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the comments about your recent stay at the Peacock Suites!  We are pleased to hear that you and your family enjoyed your visit.  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary Heading: Very nice rooms for the price.
Summary: The rooms are nice because they are a bit larger than your average room. The location works great for Disney. There is a reasonably priced shuttle to Disney. The CA Adventure Park has been updated and is also well worth the time also.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review ... We're so happy you enjoyed your stay!

Summary: My family of 6 stayed at the Peacock Suites for 5 nights on a recent trip to Disney.  The rooms were clean and comfortable, The staff was helpful and accommodating.  Housekeeping did an excellent job...always plenty of clean towels. The bus stop right in front of the hotel is the first pick-up and drop-off stop on it's Disney route which was super nice since the bus fills up quick.  There is a ticket kiosk for the bus in front of the hotel lobby.  My family enjoyed the complementary breakfast, pool, and hot tub, too.  We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you found our property to be a "comfortable, clean, and friendly place.' That is certainly our goal! We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: We stayed here for one week. This is not a resort nor are the units condos. Pros, clean, updated, maid service, fresh towels everyday and free breakfast.. Cons, small, this is a hotel room with a kitchenet and $10 per day valet parking fee. There is a wall with a sliding door that separates the beds from the rest of the room. But is not much bigger than a standard hotel room. This was a good base for us as we spent most of our time at the beach or seeing other sites in the LA area. It would be good for families going to Disneyland as it was extremely close. This met out needs as a nice, clean place to stay. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We're happy that you found our location near Los Angeles and minutes from Disneyland convenient during your recent vacation.  We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary Heading: It's reasonable and it's at Disneyland
Summary: My husband and I traveled to Disneyland recently without kids.  This place is part of our timeshare, Shell Vacations.  We had points we needed to use so we booked it about two months out.  We requested a top floor room which was not available when we checked in.  Our next request was for a room away from the noisiest areas (specifically mentioned the ice machine and elevators).  We were placed in a first floor room between the breakfast room and elevators also above the pool.  Lots of noise for sure- The room is much smaller than shown on the Shell site.  With all this said, it was clean, amenities were as stated online and the staff was as helpful as we needed them to be (except for the room placement part which was no small error).  The bed was very comfortable.  The location
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your comments and for giving an honest review.  Feedback these days is priceless and without it we cannot continue to grow and get better at what we do.  I wanted to apologize for not being able to fulfill your request for the top floor and for the noise you experienced during your stay as it is always our goal to create a relaxing  enviornment for our guests.  We hope that if you return to the Anaheim area, you will give us a second chance!

Summary: Great hotel for a Disney area vacation. Rooms have seperate bedrooms so You can put the kids to bed and still have the living room area. Excellent staff, nice pool and hot tubs, plus breakfast included, all at an excellent price. 5 minute drive to Disney parks and lots of area restaraunts. Easy access to highway giving approx 30-40 minute drives to Beverly Hills,Hollywood, Santa Monica, Los Angelas, and all the Coastal Beach Areas. (If You beat the traffic!). Discount Park tickets can be purchased at the Garden Walk mall down the street.
Manager Response: Thank you for including the Peacock Suites on your family vacation to Disneyland. We are honored that you chose to stay with us.  We look forward to seeing your family again when you return to Anaheim!

Summary: My girlfriend and I travelled to Disneyland for our anniversary/Valentine's Day and found this hotel for $59/night through a Black Friday Sale. Easily the best deal I've ever found for a hotel, especially one as nice as this!  The concierge was greatly helpful both before and after we'd arrived, helping us book transportation to and from the airport, giving us a map and book of coupons, and letting us know the best ways to get around! Check-in was quick and easy, the rooms were very clean and modern, looked like they had been recently renovated. The continental breakfast was two doors down from our room, and exceeded my expectations! The pool and hot tubs (two!) were great, and with a 7-Eleven down the street, Anaheim GardenWalk with lots of shops a couple blocks away, and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback, all of us here at the property enjoy reading reviews that are both detailed and informative.  A small insight into your experience is invaluable and we appreciate you sharing this not only with the mananagement here at the property but also our potential future guests and owners. We look forward to see you and your girlfirend on future visits to Anaheim!

Summary: We always look for a reasonable suite to stay in when we vacation. This one was very clean which is one of the main things I want.  We weren't in the room a whole lot but when we were it was very comfortable. I liked that they had a continental breakfast every morning which consisted of bagels, donuts, waffles, boiled eggs, cereal and oatmeal. Kids always need a little something to start the day and I need my coffee. Although it was very busy some mornings and the room was kind of small it was still ok.  The negatives were that we were on the first floor and could hear the people above us every second. It was a little annoying when we were trying to go to bed and then first thing in the morning. I will most definitely request the top floor next visit. Our window also looked out
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to leave us such a detailed review.  Your concerns are certainly legitimate and have been addressed with our management team and our valet company. We hope to have an opportunity to welcome you back again someday.

Summary: This hotel has been renovated/updated and was the perfect place for my family to stay.    Cleanliness: My 1 year old daughter crawled on the ground in her white tights and they were/are still white. clean rooms, clean carpet, clean place.  While the building is old there are very nice upgrades.  We enjoyed our stay.   Location: Less than 1 mile from Disneyland, we were able to walk there every day.  For the super lazy, they offer shuttle services for $5.00/day or cheaper if you buy multiple days.    Food: They offer fresh doughnuts, cereal, coffee/juice, oatmeal, etc. Really good continental breakfast compared to other places we have stayed in the area.   Pool/Jacuzzi: Nice after a long day to sit and relax.  Most places shut down pool/jacuzzi at 10pm, they keep it going until
Manager Response: We were delighted to read your observations!  We appreciate your detailing the features of our spacious suites, and resort amenities ... in particular, our staff's customer-service philosophy. Your continued patronage is sincerely appreciated, and we hope to have an opportunity to welcoming you back again someday!

Summary: I booked a room for an incredible sale price which was so low that I was bit skeptical about the quality of the property but was very pleasantly surprised by the overall experience there. The check-in process was quick, staff were friendly and valet parking was easy. The room was nicely designed and decor is contemporary and tasteful. The room's layout was great with a kitchen/dining/lounge area and sleeping area separated by a sliding divider. The room was very clean! I'd read reviews about noise and it's true, you can hear people passing in the hallway, but for such a bargain, it's really not a big deal. The breakfast was underwhelming but for a light bite it did the trick. The Disney shuttle stops here so it's convenient. We'd stay again and will recommend to friends,
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind recommendation and review. We know you have a choice when visiting the Anaheim area and do appreciate that you chose the Peacock Suites during your vacation.  We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary Heading: Great Staff, Clean Rooms, Close to Disneyland
Summary: My husband and I found this lovely hotel tastefully decorated and very clean. The staff were very courteous and cheerful. The free continental Breakfast was  great. The donuts, waffles, bagels, yogurt, cereals,orange juice and coffee were just a nice way to start the day. The only downer were the thin walls but lucky for us our neighbors didn't get loud and didn't stay up late. We stayed for a week and for a hotel which catered to families it was peaceful the whole stay. I would definately stay here again. Specail thanks to the Day Concierge who was so pleasant. Each time I came for information and directions she was so very helpful and knowledgeable.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting the Peacock Suites. The Guest Service team is always excited to be a memorable part of a guest’s experience, so we thank you for recognizing our efforts.   We thank you for choosing us for your stay in Anaheim and look forward to serving you again.

Summary: We stayed in a 1 BR on 1st floor, room was very clean and big enough for my wife and I, 12 year old and 19 month old. It's a sliding door that separates the room, not a seperate BR.  Room has fridge, microwave, toaster,plates, bowls cups and a few pices of silverware, while great for a regualr hotel, not great for a time share.  I paid for the week instead of using an exchnage, but for the price the room was great.  I read the reviews of the terrible breakfast before I came, so I was not expecting to eat breakfast there, however they do have a new menu.  They had apples, yogurt, plain bagels and cream cheese as well as the other items that were mentioned in aforementioned reviews.  breakfast was def improved from what I could tell.The walls are paper thin and YOU WILL HEAR
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed your stay the Peacock Suites!  Thank you taking the time to review your experience online.  While we understand the frustration you had with the parking/valet fee, we hope that you will understand why it is done since you have witnessed the actual parking around the property.  The parking/valet fee was started to help aliviate what could be a dreadful parking situation and to assist all of our guests with an easy parking solution.  We are happy that your overall stay was enjoyable, and we hope that you will chose to stay with us again on your future trips to Anaheim!

Summary: Great choice for our family of 3. Not super close to Disney, but we used the ART system which was RIGHT next to the hotel. Loved it! Hotel room was quality, clean, and comfortable. Separate living area with mini kitchen was perfect.  Amenities: pool, hot tub, mini arcade and workout equipment were nothing too extravagant, but we spent most of our time at Disney.  The continental breakfast was basic, but just enough to fill ya up. 7-11 was right down the street which was very convenient. Only complaint, no business center and gift shop was always closed. For 5 nights we only spent  under $460.00.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your honest feedback.  We appreciate it, and we also want you to know that we take all comments right to our management team for discussion.  We are happy to see that you enjoyed your stay and we hope that you will consider us in the future for your trips to Anaheim! Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you!

Summary Heading: Have stayed twice. Will be staying again
Summary: My family first stayed at Peacock in 2009 as my kids first trip. We went with my now deceased mom who had mobility issues at the time and we were impressed with the helpful staff and great accomodating room that my mom and son shared. She loved the safety features for her. I went on a trip last September with just my two little girls and myself and stayed again and was even more impressed at the renovations and upgrade in breakfast as that was our only complaint in 2009. We plan to go to Disneyland again next year with family and friends and definitely will be staying at Peacock. It is nice being a bit away from all the action and having that down time away.
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to come back to the Peacock Suites!  We are so glad that you keep returning to stay with us and that your experience has been so pleasant!  Thank you again for the time you took to write your review, and we look forward to seeing you next year!

Summary Heading: great hotel, nice rooms, great customer sevice, but...
Summary: This hotel is clean and well maintained.  Staff is super friendly.  The walk to Dland is just shy of a mile and why not walk, get you warmed up for the day ahead.  Only complaint is the cattle heard of the guest above us, we called the front desk but it only got worse.  This is by no means the fault of the hotel just the rude guests.  I did leave something personal behind and it was shipped to my home once I called to verify my belongings.  We would stay again in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us and other guests know about your recent experience at the Peacock Suites!  It is unfortunate that your experience fell short of the expectations that we set for all of our guests due to the noise issues you encountered.  We hope that your next stay will be more relaxing and quiet!  Thank you again for positive review, and we look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary Heading: Clean & Comfortable.  Perfect place to stay when visiting Disneyland!
Summary: It was a fantastic place to stay over the week of Valentines day!  They took great care of us and any requests we had whether it was for extra towels or wash cloths they had them to our room within minutes.  Definitely coming back to Peacock Suites again when visiting Disneyland!
Manager Response: We are so happy you enjoyed your visit to the Peacock Suites!  Thank you for your comments about the staff!  We are always thrilled to hear good things about all of our staff members and they do get passed on so that everyone knows that they have been recognized!  Thank you again for your time and we hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Amazing staff, Great services and fun times!!!
Summary: I stayed here for 5 days!!!  Over Valentine's day!!! They honestly made my stay great the staff was on top of there game I wanted extra towels and shampoo!!! It was delivered with in 10-15 mins to my room!!! They told me what was close to go get food or markets close by!!! They cleaned our room great and always stocked us up on shampoo and lotion!!! Andrew is the GM and if ya have any issue that he can fix he will be on top of it asap!!! Thank you so much for a great stay at Anaheim area!!!
Manager Response: Wow! What a great review and thank you very much for your kind words!  I have shared all of your comments with the staff and we truly look forward to serving you and your family again in the future!

Summary: I have stayed at the Peacock Suites several times. The rooms are always well maintained. Staff is excellent. The morning breakfast is a good start to your day (juice, coffee, milk, cereal, toast, pasteries and more). You can walk to Disneyland (about 3/4 of a mile). There are also several restaurants within walking distance. Since we have Disney passes, this is a great place to stay and relax.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking time out of your day to write about your experiences at the Peacock Suites!  We are always thankful to our guests who react positively to their stay and want others to know about it!  We have passed your comments on to our staff to read so that they know they are appreciated in their contributions to make your stay as nice as it was!  Thank you again, and we look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: Over the President's Day break we stayed at this property and did 2 days at Disneyland.  In the past we have done the Disney property in both Anaheim and Orlando.  Yes, it is very convenient, and can make the trip to the park very simple.  However, I personally find it to be very expensive, fun to splurge on our family, and enjoy the perks of proximity and ease, but twice was enough for us.  I felt this hotel was a bargain for what we paid, we knew we would have to drive and pay for parking, but having a continental breakfast, a microwave and refrigerator, and a little extra room was awesome.  I would absolutely stay here again, the staff was kind, helpful, the room was very clean and I would assume the property has recently been remodeled, the room was very updated.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to post your comments about the Peacock Suites on TripAdvisor!  We appreciate any and all comments (especially good ones) and pass them along to the staff!  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: This is an old hotel property that was converted into a Time Share. They don't tell you that when booking a room. Because it's a time share converted from a motel, the "kitchen" isn't any more than you'd find at a regular "Suites" style hotel. It's not really walk friendly for Disneyland. Particularly for younger kids. Probably ovwer a mile to the gate. Accessing the upper floors with luggage was challenging because you have to change elevators on your way up. Rooms were O.K. but smaller than I expected. The biggest issue I have with this facility was the manditory Valet parking that you have to pay for (I think it was $10-12 a night). It's neccessary because the parking is completely inaddequate for the number of rooms. Breakfast was a little weak, and I find that Hampton,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us and other guests know about your recent experience at the Peacock Suites!  It is unfortunate that your experience fell short of the expectations that we set for each and every guest!  We appreciate hearing both the negative and positive aspects of your stay and look to these to help us to move forward.  If your travels bring you back to Anaheim in the future, we would like to hear from you and have the opportunity to have you experience the Peacock Suites one more time.

Summary: The room was very nice and comfortable.  We had 2 queens in a room behind sliding glass doors and a sofa bed, table, fridge, bathroom in the main room.  We stayed here 6 nights and 5/6 nights were extremely quiet.  The sixth night had rude/loud people above us but not the hotels fault.   Breakfast had enough options for us to be happy with. Mandatory valet parking was extremely fast.
Manager Response: As always, we truly appreciate when our guests take time out of their schedules to write comments about their stay here at the Peacock Suites! Your comments are no exception and we are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your visit with us!

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised with my stay here. Very friendly and helpful staff. Very clean and comfortable.  The area surrounding the hotel was very nice, and even had places to go at walking distance.  I would certainly return to this hotel on my next visit.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to write such a nice review about your stay with us! We are pleased you enjoyed your visit and look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: This was our first time at Peacock, we will surely use them again.  We hade only one issue, but it was resolved imediately.  Daily breakfast was just what the granddaughhters needed.  Staff was fantastic.
Manager Response: We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Peacock Suites! Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your visit! We are always pleased to hear when guests enjoy themselves!  We hope that you will choose to stay with us again the next time you make a trip to Anaheim! Thank you again for your comments!

Summary: The front desk is very knowledgeable about the area and any questions we had.  Housekeeping were very prompt to help and make our stay comfortable.  Overall it was a very nice and comfortable stay! Our 1 bedroom came with 2 comfortable queen beds on one side of glass door and a sofa bed and a murphy bed on the other.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Peacock Suites! We are glad to hear that you had a great stay and are happy that you chose to come back to us after 12 years since your last visit! We are happy to hear that you were impressed with all of the recent upgrades to the suites and to the property!

Summary: Since our last visit to Anaheim in 2001, The Peacock Suites have continued to be an excellent property. With some upgrades evident, the Suites provided an excellent, central and welcoming place for our family of 4 (2 + 2). Close to the Theme Parks and the Garden Walk for great food, Peacock Suites staff made sure everything we needed was catered for. Nothing was a task they wouldn't arrange or provide good sound advice for.  Despite the unusual cold snap for early January, the facilities were all readily available. Even the pool & spa, with the right temperature. The breakfast room was well catered for to "start the day". We'll recommend the property to others and include it in our options for Anaheim for future visits.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I had a fantastic stay.    I found all the staff very helpful and friendly. The house keeping staff and valet drivers would cheerfully great me every time I saw them. The couple of little issues I experienced (Room Key and no laundry soap) were promptly rectified. Everyone strived to make you feel as a special guest. Even the maintenance people painting outside.   I liked that the staff offered assistance with small things too. As an example, if I needed a number for a taxi, they would offer to call the taxi for me. Then call me back to tell me when to be in the lobby. Another thing which was nice is that when you call the front desk, they answer the phone even when they are busy. I don't mind hanging on for a minute, but it drives me crazy when a hotel front desk ignores the
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking time out of your day to write about your experiences at the Peacock Suites!   We have passed along all of your wonderful comments to each department head so that they can let their staff members know that all of their hard work is being appreciated!   We are happy to hear that you would stay with us again and look forward to your return in the future!

Summary Heading: Peacock Suites definitely take care of their guests - wouldn't hesitate to stay there again!!!
Summary: Took my family of six to the Peacock Suites last week....we stayed for five days during our first visit to Disneyland. Prior to our arrival, I had contacted the hotel with a couple of questions. My questions were answered promptly and thoroughly, by two different members of the management team. I had made a couple of requests regarding our room assignment.  These requests were accommodated with pleasure. Knowing that this was our family's first visit to Disneyland, the assistant general manager arranged to have surprise gift bags and a balloon bouquet, placed in our room prior to our arrival.  She wanted to help to make the trip as magical as possible for my children. This gesture will not be forgotten. Another example of the staff's willingness to go above and beyond - I had
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay at the Peacock Suites, and would recommend us to others!  We have passed along your note to each department manager so that they, as well as their staff members are aware that everyone exceeded your expectations while you were here.  Thank you again for your comments.  We look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary Heading: Great location to Disney land ...very clean rooms
Summary: It was cool while we were there, the hotel staff and valet service was exceptional. It would have been nice to have coffee in lobby, but they did have cold water. Rooms were very comfortable. I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive review of your recent stay at the Peacock Suites!  We always appreciate our guest’s feedback.  We hope to see you back at the Peacock Suites soon!

Summary: We were very happy with this hotel. Nice rooms, we found the beds very comfortable, front desk staff helpful, housekeeping was great! Liked the pool and hot tubs. Took about 20 min. to walk to Disneyland, but you could take the shuttle from just out front. Short walk to rent a car and easy access to the I5. If we come back to California we will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.  I will definitely share your comments with our staff!  We look forward to serving you and your family again in the future!

Summary: This is the second time I stayed at the Peacock. The valet men were amazing and very polite. The service from the maids and front desk were all very helpful. Next time I would like to upgrade to the next size room. With my daughter and I and my girlfriend and her daughter sharing a small space in part of the room with two beds and nothing else to fit made the sleeping arrangement a bit awkward. Need a little more privacy. I will know for next time. The breakfast was full of alot of different choices and was a great way to start the day, on a full stomach. We were located so close to Disney and only about 45 mins from anything else we wanted to do. Love the location. We definately stay again. 3rd times a charm.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing the Peacock Suites for your recent stay in Anaheim, and for taking the time to put your comments about that stay in writing!  We appreciate all you had to say and are so glad to hear that you would return to see us again on your next trip!

Summary Heading: Clean and comfortable - but no kitchen sink.
Summary: We where pleasantly surprised. This place was clean and very comfortable. Housekeeping was awesome! we have 4 kids so we had two different accidents.  One where my kid got sick and another leaky diaper at night. Housekeeping did a very prompt and complete job of cleaning. I was impressed.  All in all, this place was a joy. I will absolutely stay here again!  Just keep in mind that there is only a half kitchen. it includes a microwave, toaster, coffee maker, half fridge, dishes, but no kitchen sink.  We where OK with this but it takes some adjusting to get used to cleaning dishes in the bathroom.  The continental breakfast was a surprise to us but it is nothing to write home about. Boiled eggs and toaster stuff, cereal, juice, etc. None the less, the free breakfast saved us time
Manager Response: Thank you for your outstanding review regarding your recent visit to the Peacock Suites.  It is always wonderful to hear that we exceeded your expectations.  Hopefully we will see you on our future visits to Anaheim!

Summary: Very nice and updated.  Breakfast is very convenient.  Staff very friendly and helpful.  No sink in kitchenette so it makes washing dishes awkward, though the housekeeping staff will do it for you as routine :-)  Kitchen is too small for family meal preparation but is great for keeping and preparing basics.  It is a 20 minute walk to Disney which is fine for adults and older children.  Not convenient for really young families as you have to pay for parking at the hotel and then at Disney or pay for the  Disney Shuttle.  Sleeping arrangements excellent for sleeping privacy and comfort (3 queen beds plus sofa bed in 1-bedroom suites).
Manager Response: Thank you for the review of your recent visit to the Peacock Suites.  It is always a pleasure to hear that our guest enjoyed what we have to offer.  If your travels bring you back to Anaheim area in the future, we hope to have you stay with us again!

Summary: I already experienced shell vacations at Hawaii, and liked it. So when I decided to go to Disneyland I didn't hesitate it and reserved peacock suite. And I was right because, I really enjoyed staying at peacock suite. The suites are large and clean, the staff really friendly and helpful. I will definitely will comeback !!
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that you were able to enjoy one of our newly renovated suites.  I will be sharing your positive feedback with the management team. We look forward to having you stay with us in the future!

Summary Heading: Less than 20 minute stroll to Disney
Summary: Suite was clean and local to many eatery ans attractions. Concierge helpful and busstop right outside what more could u ask? Oh yeah breakfast! Not the best coffee but it was convieniant  overall I would recommend and would stay again
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback regarding your recent stay.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed your time here!  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: We stayed for six nights and it is a nice hotel. The rooms are beautiful. My in laws booked our room and we were supposed to have a two room suite. Upon checking, our booked room was down for maintenance.  We were given two free nights of parking in replacement. For our family of five, we were given a king bed and a sofa bed. With us and our suitcases, we did not fit but made do. The next night, we had a one bedroom suite with two queens and a sofa bed but it what we were expecting. Again, the rooms are beautiful but the walls are THIN!  Our room faced the parking lot and between the beeps of the vehicles and the screaming and hollering from the pool, I was going nuts. It was like they were in our room with us. We could also hear the neighbouring rooms kids running like crazy
Manager Response: Thank you so much for providing us with your honest feedback.  We appreciate it, and we also want you to know that we take all comments right to our management team for discussion.  We are happy to see that overall you enjoyed your stay. If your travels bring you back to Anaheim in the future, we would like to hear from you and have the opportunity to have you experience the Peacock Suites one more time.

Summary: Is not the same if we don't stay at the Peacock Inn. The rooms are huge, nice & clean! The staff is always friendly & helpful, and the valets always have a smile on their faces & are great at remembering our names. Everyday there is something going on at the hotel so you can have fun when you're not at Disneyland! And one of the best things about this place is the heated pool & spas! Opened early & closes late, it's great to relax in the spa after a long day at the parks. The room has everything you need if you're on a budget & want to prepare your own simple meals with refrigerators, microwave & kitchen ware. We love it; it's our home away from home!
Manager Response: We’d like to personally thank you for your loyalty!  We are delighted to hear that the Peacock Suites is your "home away from home."  We appreciate the kind words, and look forward to your return visit!  Thank you again!

Summary: As I looked for a property to send my daughter and her husband to as a Christmas present I did lots of research. This mini vacation was important! It was a Christmas gift, a honeymoon that had never happened and a brief respite for first time parents! What could be better than a day at Disneyland while grandma babysat and a lovely room at the end of the day??  As I conducted research, I communicated with management staff at the hotel ( Paula!) and explained the importance of this visit. Not only was Paula and staff receptive to my many questions and concerns, but they offered to put welcoming balloons in the room, assign a particularly quiet room and "roll out the red carpet". It was hard to keep a secret from my daughter. As soon as the kids checked in, I started getting
Manager Response: Thank you for the amazing review of your daughter's recent visit to the Peacock Suites. It is always a pleasure to hear that our guests thoroughly enjoyed what we have to offer.  I will be sharing your positive feedback with Paula and the management team.  Thank you again for taking the time to let us know of your experience and we look forward to having you come stay with us soon!

Summary Heading: Great hotel at a great price
Summary: We stayed here for our first family vacation in five years the end of December. We were worried about staying at a hotel with two adults and five kids, but the rooms were spacious and the beds were comfortable. The staff was amazing and they were able to accommodate some of our unique requests with a smile and some great ideas on how to make our trip even better. Parking was a lot easier than what I imagined it would be, and the shuttle to Disneyland made our trips there so much easier. The kids loved the pool, and the spa was a nice way to relax after walking around all day. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a great place to stay at a great price.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your thoughts about the stay you and your family experienced here at the Peacock Suites!  We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your visit and truly appreciate the time you took to write your review.  We look forward to having you visit again in the future.

Summary Heading: Great experience for our first time
Summary: Everyone was terrific and nice, our room was very nice and comfortable plenty of towels. Need on site restaurant or more options for breakfast.  will stay again it was located in a good area close to Disneyland and other food places.  Valet was fast and always friendly never complained about how many times you needed your car.  No pressure to buy anything.  Desk staff friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: We wanted to take a minute to say thank you for taking the time to give such positive feedback regarding your stay at the Peacock Suites!  We look forward to having you stay with us again sometime in the future!

Summary: Great value for my timeshare property.  Sitting area is separated from sleeping area (their is a pull out itoo).  Has a little kitchette area in sleeping area with microwave and refrig.  Door to room needs weather stripping to stop a slight wind draft by door.  Trolly for Disneyland right in front of suites.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for providing us with your honest feedback. And we appreciate you informing us of the draft by the door, and we are in the process of adding the weather stripping. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel in a central location!
Summary: Stayed here Dec 2012 to visit friends and family in the area using Shell vacation points, this property now owned by Wyndham. There's no self parking, valet is $10, so it can get pricey for visitors. They can park next door at Motel 6 and just walk. The lobby is small but checkin was efficient with the friendly desk clerk ready with a map and tips and information about the hotel. The pool is not very nicely situated as is the breakfast sitting area, it is just tucked behind the hotel in what looks like a garage, but the rooms are the saving grace. We got a 1 bedroom suite, with a Japanese sliding door to offer privacy. It was clean, and the bedroom spacious, however the view of the back of another hotel or factory isn't that inviting either. The living room though is big, with
Manager Response: We always appreciate the reviews we receive from our guests!  Thank you so much!  We hope to have you stay with us again soon!

Summary Heading: A great place for grandparents to take grandchildren
Summary: My wife and I had a marvelous week with our grandson (4)  and granddaughter (1 1/2) at the Peacock Suites.  We were booked into a 2-bedroom suite which met our needs perfectly.  The amenities and hotel staff were excellent.  Rather than pay the $17 parking at Disneyland/California Adventure we took the shuttle each of the days (5) we visited the theme parks.  Our grandchildren enjoyed having their own queen size bed, especially the little one who had never slept in anything other than her crib.  The pool and hot tubs were a big hit with both grandchildren.  We enjoyed the free continental breakfast each morning before starting our day's activities.  This more than compensated for the valet charge for the rental car.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your thoughts about your stay!  We hope that if you do return to the Anaheim area, we can accomodate you and your family again!

Summary: We had a great stay. Room was quit and clean. We went to Disneyland great location to property.Close to Downtown Disney and Anaheim garden walk.  and House keeping was wonderful We forgot a package in the room they found it and turned it in to the front desk. Very honest people.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words and compliments of the staff.  It has always been and will remain our main focus to serve our guests and owners to the best of our ability.  We look forward to seeing you and your family again on future visits to Anaheim!

Summary: We have stayed here before and returned because we like this property.  The room was excellent for what we needed, clean, quiet and handy to Disneyland. The staff was excellent! We were happy with everything.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that you chose to stay with us again, and that the staff was accomodating.  We hope that we will continue to be your home away from home on your future visits to Anaheim!

Summary: This was the first time we stayed at this hotel.  We have Hilton points so we usually stay for free at either the Embassy Suites South or the Homewood Suites in Garden Grove.  But we were out of points so we were looking for a place to stay like those hotels but for much less.  This hotel room is a bit smaller than those other hotels and the free breakfast isn't as good.  But if you want a clean, comfortable, two room suite for a very reasonable price, this is the place to go.  The valets, front desk staff, and housekeepers are very friendly and helpful.  It's not quite walking distance, but it's a short drive to the Toy Story or Pumba parking lots.  And you can always take the shuttle if you don't have an annual pass for free parking.  Including all fees, taxes and mandatory
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your positive review of our property!  We appreciate all your kind words and hope that you will chose to stay with us again in the future!

Summary: The Peacock Suites is a great property to stay at. This resort is located in the heart of Orange County and is just minutes from Disneyland they offer so much and they make you feel like family . The property is very clean and cozy and they have everything  there to make you want to stay longer the staff is so great. So pack your bag and travel to the Peacock Suites Of Anaheim CA You will go back again and again have fun.                                           V.Reagan
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the positive review! We are so happy that you feel like a part of our family here at the Peacock Suites, and we always look forward to having you stay with us!

Summary: This place was great!  We stayed for a week with our 3 kids and would definitely go back.  Clean, friendly and a great location.  Our kids loved the pool, the room was very spacious, and it was quiet.  Free breakfast was a plus -- very simple, but couldn't complain.  Once in awhile we'd just grab juice, coffee and toast and head back to the room to eat yoghurt and cereal that we had bought.  Also, a laundry room upstairs was great. I was expecting pressure to do the timeshare presentation, but they mentioned it, we declined and that was the last we heard about it.   We will definitely recommend this hotel to others.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us!  Thank you for taking the time to put your comments in writing.  We look forward to having you stay with us in the future!

Summary: We stayed at the Peacock suites recently, because we wanted the kids to have a change away from home, eventhough we live in southern California.  It was a very pleasant stay.  The rooms were very spacious and nice looking.  The free breakfast was a pleasant surprise and very helpful for our budget. I certainly recommend this place to anyone thinking of coming to Anaheim of the vicinity for any reason.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate when our guests take time out of their schedules to write comments about their stay here at the Peacock Suites!  Your comments are no exception and we are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your visit!

Summary: We stayed here for a week while visiting our grandson who is in the Marines.  All of the staff were really great.  Very friendly and always helpful.  The rooms are a very nice size and very, very clean.  The location was perfect for us and the breakfast was certainly an added plus.  We would highly recommend this property.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Peacock Suites and would recommend us to others!  Thank you for your kind comments about your visit! We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: AS always Shell delivers excellent cutomer service with newly remodeled rooms and nice furnishings. Was nicer thatn the newer Embassy Suites down the road. THe front desk is always helpful and there is no pressure to do a timeshare presentation
Manager Response: We appreciate the kind words about the staff and service you received during your visit to the property!  We look forward to see you again soon!

Summary: I upgraded to the three bedroom suite to accomodate three adults and three children. The suite was excellent! 3 king size beds and a couch, 4 tvs and 2 bathrooms. So worth the extra money! I recommend this hotel if you are looking for value and location. No frills especially with the breakfast but the hotel is very comfortable and close to dining and attractions.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the comments about your recent stay at the Peacock Suites!!  We are so pleased to hear that you and your family enjoyed your visit.  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!  Thank you again for your time!

Summary: My husband and I arrived to the resort in the middle of the night. We were extremely tired. Check-in was quick. Staff greeted us with a smile even in the middle of the night. The location was perfect. We were close to everything( shopping and food). The room was clean, roomy and comfortable. We really enjoyed our stay. We look forward to visiting again in the near future.
Manager Response: We wanted to thank you for your compliments to our staff and for the kind words regarding our property.  Thank you again for your time!  We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Best choice when going to Fullerton
Summary: I wasn't expecting much for the bargain rate we paid to stay here for two nights, but I was pleasantly surprised. The hotel has valet parking only, so be prepared to pay $10 plus a tip. The etched glass door to the lobby is beautiful. The front desk agent who helped us, Karan, is simply awesome. If my review were only based on my customer service experience, it would be 5 stars.    Easy to find right off the freeway, but I didn't hear any freeway noise.  We were upgraded to the 2 bedroom suite for the first night only, which was wonderful. The first bedroom had one bed and an attached bath. The second bedroom had two beds and was adjacent to a second bathroom off the hallway. The living room was comfortable with a sleeper sofa and a table for four. The kitchenette did not have a
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback, all of us here at the property enjoy reading reviews that are both detailed and informative.  A small insight into your experience is invaluable and we appreciate you sharing this not only with the management here at the property but also our potential future guests and owners. We look forward to seeing you and your family on future visits to Fullerton!

Summary: We stayed at Peacock Suites for 4 nights while visiting Disneyland.  The two bedroom suite was perfectly comfortable for the four adults and two kids in our party.  The room was clean and the continental breakfast was basic, but good.  The hotel isn't really what I would describe as "walking distance" to Disneyland.  However, the Anaheim park shuttle picks up right at the hotel curb.  Also, Peacock Suites is the first stop for the shuttle so there was always seats- a nice perk.     Our heat wasn't working the first night, which we didn't discover until the wee hours of the morning.  The issue was fixed quickly the next morning.  I addressed the issue with the manager and asked for compensation.  She didn't hesitate to refund half of the first night's rate because of the heat
Manager Response: We wanted to take a minute to say thank you for putting your thoughts about your stay at the Peacock Suites in writing!  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your overall visit.  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: Great place, great location and wonderful staff.  Shuttle to Disneyland picks up right in front of hotel.  Easy to come back and rest.  Pool and hot tubs were relaxing.  Ok continental breakfast to get you going in the morning.  The only problem we found was no fan in the shower area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the good review and positive comments!  Hopefully we will see you on your future visits to Anaheim!

Summary: We stayed in 3 suites earlier this month with a group of Girl Scouts on a budget. This hotel fit the bill perfectly for us! Beautifully appointed rooms, with space enough to spread out. The breakfast offered is definitely sufficient, although I would like to see less sweets and a little more substance.   The staff was very helpful and the girls loved the pool area! We used the ART shuttle and were extremely pleased to be the first stop.   When not staying at the resort, this will definitely be my first choice!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay, we are happy to hear it was enjoyable.  Your comments are important to us and we pride ourselves on listening to our guests and continuing to strive to provide the best experience possible.  I hope we are able to accomodate you during your future visits to Anaheim.

Summary: When reviewing The Peacock Suites for our stay in Anaheim, I couldn't find a bad review and upon arrival realized that The Peacock Suites was amazing!  Every staff member that we came in contact with was very friendly and helpful.  There were 6 of us in the suite (they upgraded us to the murphy bed suite upon arrival - which made the room PERFECT for our family.  We all were very comfortable during our stay of 4 days/3 nights.  We used the ART shuttle which picked us up right outside the front door of the hotel each day for our trips to Disneyland and back.  The convenience of purchasing the tickets for the shuttle at the kiosk at the hotel was great!  The continental breakfast every morning was very helpful in keep us going at Disneyland until we were ready for a break.  It
Manager Response: What a great review, thank you so much for your kind words!  I have shared all of your comments with the staff and we truly look forward to serving you and  your family again in the future!

Summary: We've stayed here twice now as a family. The front desk was very helpful. The room decor is very nice and the breakfast is convenient.They were replacing all the mattresses in the rooms while we were there. A short  20 min. walk to Disneyland. We enjoyed dinner at the Cheese Factory around the corner.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your positive review!  We hope to see you and your family again soon!

Summary: this was our first time to use our shell points to book our stay at the peacock. we had a great time the room was great and we were even allowed to check in early which to me was such a plus, since we like to try to enjoy our time at the park and we did not have to worry about parking our car with all our stuff in the parks parking garage till check in time. we were able to unload and get the things we needed for the time we would be in the park. when you have little ones it is like you are packing your home. the service was great we had no issues at all. i would and have told my friends and co worker about my stay and would come again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing the Peacock Suites for your recent stay in Anaheim AND for taking the time to put your comments about that stay in writing!  We appreciate all you had to say and are so glad to hear that you would return to see us again on your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: We have stayed at the Peacock Suites many times and each and every time we are impressed with not only the facility but the high level of service and friendliness of the staff!  From the valets, front desk clerk, and house keeping each and every staff member is friendly, helpful, and courteous!  The rooms are very comfortable and extremely clean.  It is close to Disneyland, Anaheim Garden Walk, etc.  Plenty to do within walking distance...and lots of restaurants in walking distance.  HIGHLY recommend!!!  We will be back soon!
Manager Response: We wanted to take a moment to thank you for taking the time to write about your recent stay at the Peacock Suites!  We are so happy to hear that you had such a nice visit and that our staff was high on your list of what you enjoyed while here.  Thank you again for your time, we look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary Heading: Great hotel for our Disneyland vacation
Summary: Our suite had two queen beds and a couch sleeper sofa.  The room was clean and quite nice with flat screen TV and was comfortable enough for five adults.  The Disney bus stop right outside the hotel entrance was a bonus.
Manager Response: As always, we truly appreciate when our guests take time out of their schedules to write comments about their stay here at the Peacock Suites!  Your comments are no exception and we are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your visit with us!

Summary Heading: A great pick for those going to Disneyland
Summary: This is a good hotel near Disney with a bus stop right outside of the lobby.  We had a couple of glitches on check in but they went the extra mile to make sure our stay was EXACTLY what we reserved and needed.  The staff is remarkable tending to our every need.  The rooms were clean and neat and the beds VERY comfortable.  This is our second time staying here and we will be back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and compliments to the staff, it is always the goal for all guests to be comfortable and I am happy to see we were able to achieve that for you and your family.

Summary: We stayed in this hotel for two nights for our visit to Disney nd the area. Hotel was a expected. Not the newest addition to the hotel world, but recently remodeled as it seems. Hotel room was great, niely furnished and well equiped with everything you need, even for and extended stay longer than two nights. Staff is friendly and helpful, breakfast is simple and there is a coin laundry on site.  I can totally reccomend this place.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for the high marks.  Every guest who comes to the property is an opportunity for us to leave a lasting impression in hopes that you will return, and I am happy to see that you will consider us for your future trips to Anaheim!

Summary: This place is great for the budget conscious.  It is a short few blocks to Disneyland, and there are lots of eateries nearby,and a 7-11 on the corner. The rooms are good for 2-3 people, even though they are suites, they are small.  They are renovated and clean, however.  The bedroom has 2 queen beds, and a sliding door for privacy from the kitchen/living area.  The sofa sleeper in the living area is really uncomfortable - grandparens will NOT appreciate it.  Also, it is very noisy in the living area, as you can hear everyone going up and downthe halls (expecially excited little kids running).  Maid service is spotty - we went 4 days without any facecloths or soap, but they left lots of little bottles of shampoo, which we did not use. The room thermostats are locked, so you
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at the Peacock Suites.  While we are disappointed to hear that you felt your stay was only mediocre, we appreciate your comments.  We take your comments seriously and have passed them on to the managers whose departments were mentioned.

Summary: We stayed there for the kids' fall break. Fantastic choice. Everything we needed: Proximity to LA area, the beach, the shows, Disney Land, lots of great restaurants, museums.  The upgrades that had done to the suites and the outdoor areas since we last stayed were outstanding. Comfortable  bedding, high quality furniture, great room layout. Can you believe it; they have even added a stainless steel smoker/bbq?!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write about your experience at the Peacock Suites! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Nice location, nice rooms, good price
Summary: We stayed in a 2 bedroom/2 bathroom suite for 1 week this summer.  The rooms are very nice, they were recently remodeled.
